279a3(mdo sde): gnas pa gzigs sam bzhengs te/ der bzhud la klu yi sde thams cad yongasu thar bar mdzad cig/ des smras pa khyed deng shig/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong drag mang
279a4(mdo sde): 'di dag nga'i mdur du khong nas/ tshangs pa'i gnas pa dmigs pa med pa yongasu 'dri bar byed/ ngas de dag gi sems yongasu mgu bar bya'o// de nas skar pa la dga' ba'i rkang
279a5(mdo sde): pa gnyis la drang srong de dag thams cad mgo bas phyag 'tshal te// lan gsum bskar ba byas nas rdzu 'phrul gyis dadong ste/ drang srong thub pa'i gnas kyi gzhi rten du 'kho
279a6(mdo sde): de ras de dag la klu dag mgo bas phyag 'tshal te/ 'di skad ces smraso// khyed bsod nams can shes rab dang ldan pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drang srong cher dag lags na/ 
279a7(mdo sde): bdag cag yongasu bslab par gsol/ btson ra'i 'jigs pa 'di las bdag cag yongasu dgrol du gsol/ de nas drang srong de dag gis 'di skad ces smra so// nged kyis ni khyed
279a8(mdo sde): 'di nas yongasu grol bar byed par mi nuso// lag 'gro'i bdag po dag gangs kyi nub phyogs kyi ngos la drang srong thams cad kyi bla ma dbang che bar grags pa/ shes rab dang
279b1(mdo sde): thangs dang / gzi brjid chen pos rgyas bskar ma la dga' ba zhes bya ba yod/ des khyed 'di nas yongasu grol bar byed par 'gyuraro// de la phyag 'tshol cig/ de thos nas klu thams cad
279b2(mdo sde): drang srong skar ma la dga' ba la thal mo rab tu sbyar byas nas/ dbyas gcig gi 'o dod poso// de nas byang chub sems dpa' drang srong gi cha byad can drang srong skar ma la dga' bas lba
279b3(mdo sde): nga mi 'am ci dang / gnad sbyin brgya stong phrag rang mdun du bad cing yang su skor te/ de nas rdzu 'phrul gyis chas nas drang srong thub pa'i gnas deng yang byin par gyur te/ de la k+Sha
279b4(mdo sde): thams cad mgo ngos phyag 'tshal te/ gus pa mchog bskyed nas 'di skad ces smraso// gang bdag cag rang rang gi gan su mchis nas dga' bar 'gyur bar bdag cag yongasu bskya
279b5(mdo sde): du gsol/ gnas 'di nas bdag cag yongasu dgrol bar gas 2/ dus shes pa dus la lta ba drang srong chen po da sa kyang rkyen gyi dbang gis de dag la rgyu skar gyi
279b6(mdo sde): bo rims kyi gtam bcams pa/ ji ltar thams cad thar 'gyur ba/ de bzhin du ni bshad par bya/ khyed la phan pa gzhan med kyis// mthar gyi su ni mnyan par gyis// 'dir
279b7(mdo sde): mi rang sa gang gnas pa// de ni dbyang zla tha chungs te// de ni nyi ma'i lha yin zhing // klu rnams kun dang 'brel ba yin// skar ma'i dpyad ni 'phangs pa dang / snying por drang srong stsa
279b8(mdo sde): ngas bstan// gza' dang rmyi skar skar ma rnams// na mkha' la ni su yis bzhag/ mkhas pa rnams ni dga' dgyed pa// lo skor shes pas pa 'du gsol// zla nga nyid rgyusar
280a1(mdo sde): // dang nga dgaza' rnams 'gro ba ji ltar lags// rla nga rnams kyi dang por ni// rgyu skar gang zhig 'byung bar 'gyur// zla ba'i lung tsam gang zhig lags// go rims kyang na
280a2(mdo sde): ci 'dra lags// lha ni ci lags rus ci lags// lci ba ci lags yang ba gang // phan pa ci lags yang yi// stobs ci bdag la myur du gsungs// gang gis su ni mchen mo 'tho
280a3(mdo sde): nyi ma'i mdud ra ci zhig lags// grib ma'i gom pa du zhig du// nyi ma 'khor bar bgyid pa lags// zla ba gang la lho phyagasu// nyi ma drang du ji ltar gnas// drang srong khrod la kun nu
280a4(mdo sde): rang bdag cag la ni kun sten cig/ shes rab chen po 'jig rten ma khas// skar la dga' la de skad smras// bskal pa bzang por zhugs pa na// sngon chad 'drung ba skye lags
280a5(mdo sde): 'gro// dpal ldan gro khyer lnga len du// 'dod pa spangs shing chos deng ldan// gtsang ma 'dod cing rab mkhas pa'i/ mi rgyal 'byor ba chen po byung // de yi btsun
280a6(mdo sde): mo dam pa ni// 'dod pa rnams la chums gyur nas// de tshe yul ni dben par yang // gzu lums can dang lhan cig spyad// mngal ni smin par bya ba'i phyir// yang dang yang du spyad
280a7(mdo sde): rasu// de tshe chos kyis sgrub par gyur// mi sdug pa'i khye'u zhig drung // dong bu'i mgo dang bung mgrin po// bong sna bo la bong gdong po// thams cad bcung po ral pa can// mi
280a8(mdo sde): lus ni phyed yod pa'i// de mthong 'jigs nas myur du ni// sngam bris pa ni dang bor// reg tu mi rung mi gtsang ba// de phyir srin mo bong mos blangs// gangs kyi gan su sang na su/ 
280b1(mdo sde): dul chags pas gsos pa yin// bcud kyis len ni 'thungs pas na// de tshe lha dang lhan cig 'grogs// shes rab chen po skal ldan po// rab tu bcom ldan snying rje'i sems// gzi
280b2(mdo sde): brjid chen po byams pa thob// sems can kun la phan byed pa'o// lha'i tshogs kyang 'dus na su// rnga bong la ni phyag 'tshal nas// de la yang ni snying ce'i phyir// gangs kyi ri bo sprul pa
280b3(mdo sde): byas// shing dang me tog 'bras bur ldan// dri zhim dga' bar byed pa ste// sna tshogs rtsi yis khebs pa la// bya rnams sna tshogs rten pa yin// der ni drang srong rnga dong ri// rnam par
280b4(mdo sde): dben par rten nasu// lo ni drug khri tham par yang // rkang pa gcig gis dka' thub gnas// brgya byin tshangs pas phyag bya sa ste// lha rnams kun gyis mngon par bstod/ 
280b5(mdo sde): gzugs rten lha rnams thams cad dang // der ni tshangs pa nye b.ra'o ngas// 'dod rten lha rnams thams cad dang // der ni brgya byin nye bar 'ongs// klu dang gnod sbyir grul bu
280b6(mdo sde): dag/ thams cad der ni nye bar lhags// 'jig rten gang su mkhas pa ni// drang srong tshangs par spyod pa rnams// 'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs khams dang // thams cad da
280b7(mdo sde): ni nye bar lhags// kun gyis drang srong rnga bong la// mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byas// btud nas thal mo sbyar byas te// brgya byin tshangs pas 'di skad smras// skal ldan chen po kye khyed ni
280b8(mdo sde): ci phyir nged la mngon par dga'// re ba ci 'dra ci la bsams// ci 'dod pa ni smra bar gyis// drang srong rnga bong gis smras pa// gza' dang rgyu skar ma rnams/ mkha' la si dra
281a1(mdo sde): // drung gyur pa'i// sngon gyi bskal pa bdag gis dran// nyin zhag tu ni myuskar rnams// re rems ri rgyu bar byed// cha rabs kun du rgyu sar gyi// yon tan las nar sor ma par shes
281a2(mdo sde): bskal pa bzang po 'di la ni// 'di re ci yang mi snang na// snying brtse dbyis te khyod kyis ni// rgyu skar po rims kun zhog shig/ ji ltar 'jig rter 'dir ga ras bzhir// de'i las dang
281a3(mdo sde): yon tan gsungs// yor tan rgya mtshor shed cig ces// lha'i tshogs rnams kun gyis smras// drang srong rnga bong gis smras// re shig dang por sIr drug ces// rgyu skar dkyil 'khor thams
281a4(mdo sde): cang la// nang gi dang por bzhag par bya// ji ltar smin drug bzhag pa bzhin// 'di la su zhig dang pa dbul// lha'i bu re nye pa yang // skar pa drug pa ston par byed// sIr drug rgyu sar dag
281a5(mdo sde): ring mkha' la rtag tu rgyu dar shog/ thams cad lnga na ba'i 'khor dga' nas// me lha zhig ni sprul pa bya sa// gzi brjid char po drang srong lnga// me nga ni 'jug gi bus
281a6(mdo sde): spras pa// bdag gi sring mo'i bu 'di dag/ gling bzhi par ni gnas par shog/ drang srong rnga bong slar smras pa// dang po smin drug de dag yang // rgyu skar chu'i rus can re// gnyis pa yang ni yin
281a7(mdo sde): par bya// skye dgu'i bdag gis 'di skad smras// bdag gis bu lnga dbul lags te// rus ni drang srong chen po chu// rab tu bcon ldan snar ma lags// chu yi rus kyi rgyu skar na// 
281a8(mdo sde): ma'i ming gi gnyis pa lags// zla ba'i bu po gsum po ni// ming ni mgo zhes bgyi ba lags// b+ha ra dwa Ta'i rus su ni// mgo zhes bgyi ba bzhag pa lags// rab tu mi bzang lag
281b1(mdo sde): ces pa// lnga drag rnams kyis bstan pa lags// ljang sde'i bu'i bu rus su// de ni bzhi par bzhag par lags// drang srong bcas pa'i lha tshogs kyis// nyi ma'i bu ri bstan lags te/ 
281b2(mdo sde): nang so lags shing gnas 'jog rus// phur bu'i bu ni gsum lags te// lag gi bu'i rus lags shing // rgyal zhes bgyi bar de dag bshang// sa srung gi ri du lnga po// brtul zhugs
281b3(mdo sde): spyod pa mkhas pa rnams// mdza' bo'i bu'i rus lags te// de ltar de dag rgyu skar bdun// shar phyogs kha 'dzin rnamasu bzhag/ de'i las dang go rims dang // sbyar ba kha 'jen
281b4(mdo sde): gzhung las bstan// ngas kyang yang ni khyed cag la// gling bzhi pa na gnas byed cing // las ni ci 'dra sgrub byed pa// mdor ni myur du bshad par bya// phur bu'i bu ni bu lnga
281b5(mdo sde): 'o dbyang grol brtul zhugs 'chang ba dag/ ser skya'i bu yi rus su ni// lho yi phyogasu ngas bzhag/ dbyangs can gyi ni bu gnyis po// ming gis kyang ni gre yin te/ 
281b6(mdo sde): drang srong go'u ta ma rus su ni// lho'i phyogasu ngas bzhag go// lha mo yi ni bu gnyis po// ming gis kyang ni dbo yin te// ko'u di nA'i rus su ni// lho phyogs kha 'dzin
281b7(mdo sde): gsum pa bzhag/ sdig pa yi ne bu bstan pa// drang srong ka ta'i bu'i rus// lngar bcas drang srong rnams kyis der// me ba'i zhes ni bya bar bzhag/ dri za'i bu ni rab pa
281b8(mdo sde): skad dka ta'i bu yi rus yino// sa ri de ni ma yi bu// ka ta'i bu chen rus yin// 'dir ni sa ga dpal gyi bu// ka ta'i bu rgan rus yin te// drang srong rnams kyi rgyu skar bdun/ 
282a1(mdo sde): / lho phyogs kha 'dzin dam su bzhag/ mdza' bo'i bu'i bu bzhi po// drag po'i dra yi rus yin te// ming gis lha mtshams zhes bya ba// nung phyogasu ni banag pa yin// da
282a2(mdo sde): za yi ni bu gsupa ste// zla ba ka ta'i bu li rus// 'jam pa'i las de thams cad la// gnyis ba snan ni bzhag pa yin// sa'i lha mo'i du gsum ste// snangs ni lag pa'i bu yi rus/ 
282a3(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i lha mo'i bu bzhi ste/ ka da'i bu yi rus yin// thams cad lga zhes bya ba ba ni// mo'u dgal bu yi rus yino// snabs dang chu stod du slang gnyis// rgyu skar gsum po bzhag pa
282a4(mdo sde): yin// sred med bu'i bu gsum po// rgyu skar rnams ni ji bzhin 'khod// khyab 'jug gi ni bu gsum ste// ka ta'i bu paM dpal gyi rus// de ltar de dag rgyu skar mdur// rub phyogs
282a5(mdo sde): kyi ni kha 'dzin yin// nor ny+dza'i bu ni mad gru ste// drang ngan pa'i rus yi no// chu lha'i bu ni gcig pu ste/ deb tshe bu yi rus yin zhing // sman ma sbrul gyi lha mo yi/ 
282a6(mdo sde): rgyu mar men gre gnas pa yin// sdig pa yir ni bu gnyis te// khrums stod ces ni bya bar bshad// chu yin pa'i rusu ni// gsum pa 'di ni bzhag pa yin// lha yi drang srong chu lhal/ 
282a7(mdo sde): drums smad ces ni bya bar bshad//  nye drang srong rus yin par// bzhi pa 'di ni bzhag pa yin// lha yi drang srong rgyal gyi bu// nam gru zhes bya de bstan te// drang srong dbang po'i
282a8(mdo sde): rus su ni// lnga pa 'di ni bzhag pa yin// dri ba'i rgyal po'i bu gsum ste// ne len du yi rus yin zhing // chus tha skar zhes bya ba// 'jig rten mkhas pa rnams kyis ban
282b1(mdo sde): drag po'i bu ni gsum yin te// bra nye ngan spong rus yino// rgyu skar bdun po de dag ni// byang phyogs kha 'dzin rnamasu bzhag/ rgyu skar nyi shu ca brgyad po// kha 'dzin bzhir ni gzhung las
282b2(mdo sde): gtor ma ras dang yon tan rnams// mdor ni nga yis bshad par bya// thams cad rab tu thal sbyar 'khod// lha dang shed las skyes rnams kyis// drang srong rnga bong la ni smras// mi dge snga
282b3(mdo sde): du 'gro ba'i las// gang byas khyod ni mi sdug skyes// gang du thams cad myur zad 'gyur// 'di na lha dang mi rnams dang // drang srong dag dri zhi ba rnams// thams cad gzugs ni bzang
282b4(mdo sde): bar gyur// rigs dang sprin ldan de dag kun// drang srong rnga bong de la ni// ngargya byin lhan cig 'khod nas// 'kho ra kun rangs te thal sbyar gyur// bsam pa gcig tu smras pa
282b5(mdo sde): na mkha' 'di la rgyu skar ni// gang zhig dang po rgyu bar byed// kha za su ni ci za shod// mi rnams kyi las ci sgrub// yun ni ci srid rgyu bar byed// drang srong de dag thams cad la/ 
282b6(mdo sde): rnga bong gis ni 'di skad smras// ji ltar nga yis brjod pa bzhin// 'dir ni khyed kyis dad pa phul// rgyu skar 'di la nga mchog phyin// de ni khyed la brjod par bya'o// go rims shes pa
282b7(mdo sde): nga bdag bzhin// gling bzhi sems can phan pa'i phyir// lo skor yang ni shes par bya// dang por nyi ma gang yin pa// ngas byas pa ni nga yi mig/ du drug g.yon can sems rangs pa
282b8(mdo sde): de ni nga yis dang por 'arjod// de yi phyir na smin drug ni// rgyu skar tshogs ni thams cad// nang gi gtso bor gyur par shog/ zla ba nya dang nyi ma yi// nyin mtshan de dag mnyam par gnas/ 
283a1(mdo sde): // mtshan mo gzhan ni mun khyad dang // mu lba yang ni gnas par 'gyur// 'gre ba bzod pa'i bgrang ba dang // bra nye gnas bzhin 'di bshang // men sra bsu drug bcur gyur te/ 
283a2(mdo sde): sgras du dang ni brgyad pa gcig/ brgyad pa blag ni bcu drug la// cha ni gcig tu 'gyur ba yin// ma ni drug su tham pa la// lung tsam cig ni de yin// de tsam yangasam sum thu la/ 
283a3(mdo sde): 'dir ni 'jig rten gnas pa yin// ri rab g.yas nas bskor ba'i tshe// yud tsam sum cus 'gro bar byed// 'dir ni mor sran tshong ma 'aza'// bya ba nyu bsgrub par gyis// rgyal
283a4(mdo sde): bo nang pas 'gro ba kun// zhag cu tham par tham par bgyis// rtag tu dang pas mtshon chas bsrungs// mchog sbyin khyod kyi bu skye gang // tshor ba dbang po thul ba dang // chos kyi
283a5(mdo sde): gros nab sol// mngal du nying mtshams sbyar bar 'gyur// 'dir ni grol bya ba ma// mu slang bra nye ga sum pa yin// me bzhi snar ma gro bzhi no// nor chung byed
283a6(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba yin// snangs dang skag dang nam gru ni// lam dag gi ni rgyu skar yin// khrums stod dang ni snron dang ni// rgyal dang yang ni khrums spad ni// phun sum tshogs par byed
283a7(mdo sde): ba yin// chu dang chu sring tha skar dang // men gru dang ni smir drug dang // dbo zhes bya ba dag gis ni// bde bsgrub par byed pa yin// 'dir ni mag dang nag pa dang // man gru dang ni man
283a8(mdo sde): gre dang // sa ri dang ni rnam drug gis// grogs po dang ni grags mchog 'gyur// lha yi dbang pos 'di skad smras// sprin gyi tshon chos gnyis la// yud tsam sum bcur mi bzad
283b1(mdo sde): bas dbya phyir mkha' la khyod gnas kyis// khyod kyis kyang ni la phug dang // bu ram zas la gnas par gyis// nad pa zhag ni bcu gsum khrol// da ltar skye dgu skye ba med// shin tu
283b2(mdo sde): tshul 'tshal snying rje spangs// mchod sbyin dang skye ba dang ni// sman la skyes che rtag tu ni// mngal du mtshams sbyor srung bar gyis// nag pa dang ni mo gru dang // mgo la grag pa mang du byed/ 
283b3(mdo sde): byi bzhin dang ni gre dang nga'o// las dag gi ni rgyu skar yin// khrums stong dang ni khrums slad ni// chung byed mchu dang chu stong dang // tha skar phun sum tshogs par byed// snrubs dang skag
283b4(mdo sde): dang nam gru dang // man gri me bzhi snar pa ni// bde dwa ba sgrub par byed pa yin// bra nye dang ni grwa dang ni// mu spang mdza' ngo'i mchog tu 'gyur// khrums snying dang ni sa ri
283b5(mdo sde): mon gre dang ni nam so dang // sa ga dang ni lags kyang ni/ 'dir ni rnam pa drug tu gyur// lha'i drang srong nges gsob kyis// skabs bshad pa na chos gsum la// yud
283b6(mdo sde): tsam sum bcu na mkha' la// bya ba che chung khyod gnas kyi// zas ni 'bras bu la phug dang // bdug pa dang ni me tog ste// zhag ni sum bcur bdag nyis kyis// nad pa yang ni thar
283b7(mdo sde): bar byed// gang zhig spyod par byed pas ni// skye dgu mi skye nor dang 'bru// skal ldan skye bu rnam pa dang // sa la las ni byed par 'gyur// mgo la mngal du 'tshams sbyar ba// rta dang
283b8(mdo sde): yang ni rnga mo dang // glang po che dang khyu mchog dang // dred dang bcas pa'i rnam par gyur// chu stod dang ni gre dang ni// bra nye yang ni gsum pa ste// 'jig pa'i rgyur gyur skag dang spungs// 
284a1(mdo sde): // de la 'phel bar byed par 'gyur// nam gru bgrang dang mnyam gyur te// man gru las kyi rgyu skar yin// khrums sbed ces ni bya ba yang // de la chud par byed par 'gyur//

284a3(mdo sde): dang rgyal zhes bya ba yang // de la bde ba byed par 'gyur// khrums slad ces ni bya ba ni// grogs dang grogs po mchog tu gyur// drug po 'di dag lag dang ni// gre zhin snar ma gsum
284a4(mdo sde): pa yin// smin drug ces ni bya ba dang // byi bzhin dang ni dpe yino// 'di ni khron pas ring gyur// me lha yin te sa gas bshad// gleng bzhir ches ni bco lnga la// khyod spyod yud ce

284b1(mdo sde): nam gru skrag ni bde byed yin// gre dang yang ni chu smad dang // gsum pa bra nye sgrub pa yin// mdza' bo dang ni mdza' mchog du// de dag deng ni 'gyur ba yin// nag pa sdar ma mon

284b6(mdo sde): 'khor skyeng ba bzhin// de bzhin du ni mi bzad pa'i// bra nye yang ni 'gro bar shog/ 'dzam gling 'di la ston par shog/ de bzhin khyed cag thams cad kyis// de la dmod pa 'dor bar
284b7(mdo sde): gyis// de bzhin 'gro la bstan par gyis// kun gyis smras pa// de bzhin rtag tu gyur par shog/ mi bzad pa'i bya ba gyis// khyed kyis spyad pas gang skye ba// mi yi thu bo mi bzang
284b8(mdo sde): 'gyur// de'i mngal 'jug chu stong yin// bre nye la ni skyes pa'i mi// 'chi ba'i chen lha 'tshams dang // khrums sted ces ni bya ba yin// 'di la mkhas pas brtag byas te// sa
285a1(mdo sde): mon gru ma yin gzhi// dmag 'gro cod pa'i gnas dag gi/ bya spang spu gri'i las mi bya// snang ma me bzhi zhin ni// rgung byed dgra rnams khyod kyis gzham// khyod kyi las
285a2(mdo sde): riche chung kur// gre yi rtser bya bar gyis// chu smad dang ni dpe yang ni// phun sum tshogs pa byed par byed// sman rnams rten bya sbyir dang dul// gos dang rgyan gyi bya ba'ang brjod// mgo
285a3(mdo sde): nab pa zhes bya dang // gro bzhir mchu ni bde bar byed// sa gnab se len gre sde// de dag lam 'jug sgrub pa yin// skag dang snrums shes bya ba dang // tha skar dang ni mchu dang bre// gro
285a4(mdo sde): ngo mchog tu 'gyur ba yin// bsgrub tu mi rung las kyang gyis// 'di che khri bzhon gos dang lam// mdza' bo rnams la 'ang btsam par bya// nyi mi'i bu ni rig dmar ste/ 
285a5(mdo sde): drang srong chen po der dbang bcug/ bcu gnyis khyim dus ga nas de nas// der yod las 'thun grib go ma drug/ deng ni 'dus kyang mnyam pa yin// nyin dang mtshan kyang
285a6(mdo sde): mtshungs pa yin// de yod tha skar mtshan mo gang // lha mtshams nyin par gnas pa na// khyod kyis nga ni spangs par gyis// mkha' la spyod cing khyod kyis ston// gling bzhi pa ni mgu
285a7(mdo sde): bya'i phyir// 'dir ni ji ltar lpags pa bzhin// ngas 'dir gang zhig yang dag brjod// lha'i drang srong kun dgar gyur// de bzhin khyed ni kun tu song // smin drug de bzhin me yi lha// bang
285a8(mdo sde): nyid gling bzhi der gnas shing // khyed kyis me bzhin mur bya gyis// yud tsam sum khur tshal du sang // der gang mi y-i zas 'byung ba// dam pa'i grags dang langs spyad kyang // rdza
285b1(mdo sde): khyod 'dir yang legs rdzogs// de ltar nga yis thos pa yin// zhag bzhi tha mar dad pa ni// myur ba kho nas thar bar gyis// mngal du 'jug pa me bzhi srungs// chu snron 'chi bar
285b2(mdo sde): byed pa yin// skag khrums stod smad rab so dang // mon gre 'brel bar byed pa yin// khyed kyis bya ba 'di spongs shig/ da ga dang cod pa'i gnas 'gre dang // spu gre yi ni las
285b3(mdo sde): rar so// gro zhin dang ni reg pa dang // mgo ni rgud par byed pa yin// lag dang dbo ni 'dir 'jims byed// byed pa'i bya ba 'dir gyis shi / tshe dang chung ba gang ci yang // slar mas
285b4(mdo sde): phur sum tshogs par byed// byi bzhin dang ni dag par bcas// / der ni bya ba gang rtsi dang // gom pa sbyin pa gos dang lam// der ni rgyan gyis brgyan par bya// lha ni bde bar byed
285b5(mdo sde): pa ste// mor gru dang ri sa ri yang // gsum po dag ni de da ga yin// lam du 'jug pa'ang de dag yin// rgyal dang lha 'tshams khrums sdong ni// las dag
285b6(mdo sde): sgrub par byed pa yin// 'chu snrums skag dang khrums slang dag/ de dang de rnams drag byed grogs// bskal bzang dag ma bdeng dang gzhon// mal yang der ni de bya ste// khyim dang
285b7(mdo sde): dus shes bya ba dang // gza' rnams bdag gis brjod pa yin// de ltar bdag gis dus kun brjod// khyod ci drang srong lha mi dga'// bdag gis byed bshad pa bzhin// lha dbang
285b8(mdo sde): drang srong 'khor dang bcas// mi yis thal sbyar 'di skad smras// 'byung po kun la phan pa khyad// 'gro ba la skyob pa khyed// de ltar shes mnyam ji bzhin khyod // yang smras pa/ 
286a1(mdo sde): / bong bar gyi drang srong ste/ snang mchu yi rigs kyang yin/ chu yi lha mo khyod yin na// gsum pa yang ni 'gro bar gyis// byed pa chung dang 'dring yin zhing /

291a4(mdo sde): snron dang 'dir mi khrums slad yin// cha sdang drang srong kun lngas smras// chos ldar bani bcu lnga yud 'gro// khyod chung sdu byang khyod zas mngang // zhag bdun nas ba
291a5(mdo sde): spyi ba bsrung // khyod spyang skye dgu su skye ba// bu ldan yin zhing nad kyang med// grogs mang rab tu 'drer ba ste// mngal du 'jug pa'ang chu stong yin// mor gre dang ni lab
291a6(mdo sde): ni ras ri kho nas 'phel bar byed// khrums smad dang ri lha 'tshams dang // rgyal yang 'dir ni 'chi byed yar// gshir rje'i lha mo las mgos smras// rgyal zhes bya dang lha 'tshams
291a7(mdo sde): dang // khrums smad bde bar byed pa ste// tha skar mchu snrums sgrub pa yin// dbo zhes kyang ni bya ba dang // chu slangad sprir drug grogs kyang byed// snar ma ji bzhin bcis nas kyang // gsu
291a8(mdo sde): pa me bzhi grogs mchog yin// mor bre bra nya'i lha mo smra// gling bzhi mkha' la khyod song shig/ yud cem bco lngar zho mar zo// zhag bdun nad gsos las kyang chung // 'dir
291b1(mdo sde): khyod gnas pas skye dgu skye// khro bar byed pa sdang ba yin// du bran la ni srung bar gyis// mjal 'jug 'dir ni sa ri yin// tha skar chu snrums 'phel bar byed// chu smad ces ni
291b2(mdo sde): byang dang // sprin drug 'chi bar byed pa ste// dbo yang gsum par shes par bya// khrungs smang rgyal dang lha 'tshams ni// rlung byed lag las rgyu sar yin// khrums stong nang sos
291b3(mdo sde): ga ste// de dag phun sum tshogs par byed// snron skag nam gru bde bar byed// gre dang chu stod bre nye grub// gro zhin mgo dang me bzhi dang // snang ma byi bzhin grogs mchog grags
291b4(mdo sde): khrums steng drang srong gis smras khyod// las chung g.yo byed yud tsam cur // bcu bzhi ches gling 'di bder song // sha srad khyod zo me tog rnams// der ni sems can ga
291b5(mdo sde): dge skyes// gya gyu g.yo nurtun zhing 'thab// ri dang / sa srog gcod yud sum dur// nang pa myur duHra byeng yin// skye dgu de dag dmag rkun dang // rgyun snga ga
291b6(mdo sde): srungs sa ga yang // 'dir ming la 'jug yin bra nye dang // chu stod gsum pagre 'dir 'phel// snar ma byi zhin shi sos byed// thams cad bya phyir nab se lag/ chung byeng rang phra
291b7(mdo sde): sman sag bzhin// phun tshogs khrums spang lha 'tshams rgyal// tha skar mchu snrums 'dir 'de byed// smin drug chu bo gsum pa sgrub// men gru mgo dang nag pa grags// 
291b8(mdo sde): grags mchog mar gru lags ri// khrums smang nyi ma'i lha mo khyod// bcu gcig chos la mkha' la song // yung tsam pa'i btsun lngar song // ri rigs sha gter zhag bdu
292a1(mdo sde): / khyed spyang skye dgu sa skye ba// glu dang gar mkhan nor 'bru rang // rang tu rig pa'i pha rol phyir// 'dir chos kyi skyer ba breng // lnga 'jams 'phel byed sder drug dang / 
292a2(mdo sde): smang 'chi bar byed pa ste// nag pa mgo dang gro zhin dang // rgyal de'i las kyi rgyu skar yin// snrums dang tha skar mchu rgung byed// nam gru snor skag 'dir pun tshogs// me ba'i byi zhir
292a3(mdo sde): sgrub pa ste// bde bar byed pa rku stong gre// bra nye dang ni dag pa dang / sa ri mor gru lag yi no// nam gu dang ni sa ga dang // mor gru gsum pa grogs mchog yin// drang srong lha mo rgyal
292a4(mdo sde): smras khyod // mi'i 'jam chung bya ba'i phyir// bcu bzhi'i tshes bu da sum cur song // gtor ma bu ram mun bsrung // zhag ni nyi shur khyod srungs pa// skye dgu skye 'dzings nor
292a5(mdo sde): 'bru lngar// sbyor dang rang sbyor bya ba dang // dbyigs rnams dpag tu rad pa'ang yir// de'i mngal 'jug sngon yin te// me bzhi snar ma byi bzhin 'phel// sa ri ren gru lag 'chi byed// 
292a6(mdo sde): las kyi rgyu skar 'dir skrag yin// dbo dang chu slang smin drug bde// gro zhin rag bsnang ma sgrub// du steng gre bra nye chung byed// tha skar snrums pur tshogs byed// nang se sa ga mor bre grogs
292a7(mdo sde): rgyal dang lnga 'tshams grogs mchog ste// khrums stong drang srong gis smras pa// dri za'i lha mo yung sum cu// tshes ni bcu bzhir khyod song shig/ myur bya'i gtor ma zar dron sha/ 'dir zhab
292a8(mdo sde): nyi shu lnga nang yin// srog ldan 'bras dkar brgya'i srungs// khyod spyang skye dgu su skye ba// sman sbyor byed pa sbar ba yin// glu gang rol mo'i sgra mkhas 'gyur// 'dir de'i mngal snrums yin
292b1(mdo sde): rag pa mgo dang gro zhin 'phel// nab so mon gre lag 'chi byed// skye 'chi 'phel nyo tshang las bgyed// thab mo 'dreg mkhan las rtag spongs// smin drug gre dbo chu smad gnyis/ rgud
292b2(mdo sde): byed 'dir ni dgra par byed// khyod kyis las dag che chung byas// mchu dang gre 'dir brtan phun tshogs// chu stod dang ni bra nye dang // gsum pa khrums smad bde bar byed// me bzhi sngar
292b3(mdo sde): ma bde bya phyir// gtsang ba'i lam du 'gro ba yin// lag dang mon gru sa ri sgrub// drag po'i las rnams kun gyis shig/ rgyal dang lha 'tshams khrums stong grogs// bya ba skal
292b4(mdo sde): bzang 'dir chung za// skag snron grogs mchog bstan pa ste// khrums slad 'dir yang gsum pa yin// skal pa bzang dang bzhon dang // mal dang shin tu bstan par gyis// drug
292b5(mdo sde): bdun de dag las bzhin dang // sna tshogs mkhas pas she sa na su// sngod gyi bya ba bzhin du gyis// gshin rje'i lha chos bcu bzhir song // zla wa zla ba rangs pa'i tshe/ 
292b6(mdo sde): srid drug kyang ni 'gro bar gyis// lnga dang mi dang drang srong rnams// byed pa gang gis sngar bstan bzhin// zhag ni sum cu zla ba rangs// nyin dang mtshan ni mnyam pa ste// lud cer bco lnga
292b7(mdo sde): lnga yin// bring ra'i grom drug 'dir kun 'khor// tha skar gyis ni mtshan mo 'thob// nyi ma'i mdun na lnga 'tshams te// lho phyogasu ni nyi ma 'khor// bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor mig dpar
292b8(mdo sde): yin// nyi bu lha srang rab spo byas// khyod kyi zla ba 'di la ni// tsa dang lag 'gro gnod sbyin dang // sdig pa la sogs bsrang bar gyis// cha dang char ni dus bzhag par// sdig pa zhes
293a1(mdo sde): // bu khyod par song // phyogs dang phyogasu las bzhag par// khyod ni yang dag phan par song // mi mthun mthun dang 'phel 'di yid// 'gro ba la ni phan pa yin// rjesu 'thur
293a2(mdo sde): ngag gis// dang por bsdu bar byas 'di yin// de nas drang srong rngabang gis thams cad la thal ma rab tu sbyar te// la ba la go bar byed cing sbas pa// 'di ltar bdag gis so/ 
293a3(mdo sde): rims kyi dang po dang // mtshan mo dang / nyin mo dang / zla ba dang / za ba phyed dang / rgyu skar dang / gza' dang / dus dang / khyim dang / gnas dang / 'gro bar byed pa dang / 'khor ba dang / 
293a4(mdo sde): 'gro dang / mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / rnam par shes pa de bzhin du da ltar yang bstan cing rnam par gzhag na// ci khye da cag 'di ltar rnam par gzhag pa dang
293a5(mdo sde): gdags pas rgyu skar dang / gza' yongasu mgu ba la rjes yi rang bar byed ma/ 'on te ma yin// de nas de nyid kyi tshe lha ma yin dang / mi dang / drang srong dang / lha dang / 
293a6(mdo sde): ngag 'gro dang / mi 'am ci'i tshogs thams cad kyis thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ 'di skad ces smraso// kye khyod ni lha thams cad kyi bla ma/ lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
293a7(mdo sde): 'gro ba'i nang na gtso bo mtshungs pa med par mkhas la mngon por rtogs pa'i snying brtse bas bskal pa pha rol dran pa'o// sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pa'o// dpal
293a8(mdo sde): thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'o// yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// dus gsum thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa yin te/ 'di lta bu'i mtshan mo dang / nyin mo da
293b1(mdo sde): nad cig dang // rgyu skar dang / gza' dang / zla ba dang / zla ba phyed 'dogs par byed pa'i ye shes de lta bu su la yod pa'i sems can de lta bus yang lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'gra
293b2(mdo sde): ba'i nang na med pa yin// ji ltar khyod kyis da ltar btags pa bzhin du/ bdag cag thams cad kyis der dad pa byin pa yin// rje su yang yi // legs ldan leg so// sems can thams
293b3(mdo sde): cang la phan pa'i phyir rgyu skar dang gza' dang / khyim dang / dus kyi tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba'i zla ba gnyis pa yang gdags par gyis shig/ drang srong rnga bong gis rab tu smras pa/ bdag gis
293b4(mdo sde): rgyu skar sIr drug brjod// zla ba nya tshe zla rangs 'gyur// ston zla tha chungs zhes bya ba// 'di ni rab tu brjod pa yin// mtshan mo yang ni yud tsam cig/ yongasu bskor te slar ldog byed// bra nye dang
293b5(mdo sde): smin drug kyang // lan gnyis yongasu 'khor bar byed// de nas rgyus ra thams cad kyang // phyir zhing 'jug par byed pa ste// snar ma cig pu'ang zla dor der// chos gcig la ni
293b6(mdo sde): mkha' la 'gro// ji ltar sngar bya bshad pa bzhin// de bzhin khyod kyis skye dgu srungs// de tsam rago chas gnyis la 'gro// de tsam lag chos gsum la 'gro/ tshes gzhi la yang nang sa
293b7(mdo sde): rgyal yang ches ni lnga la 'gro// tshes drug la ni skrag gi tshig/ mchu yang tshes ni bdun la bsrung // tshes brgyad la yang gre yin te// tshes dgu la ni dbo 'gro byed// me bzhi tshes ni bcu la 'ju
293b8(mdo sde): nag pa'ang tshes bcu gcig la 'gro/ sa ri'ang tshes bcu gnyis la gnas// tshes bcu gsum la sa ga ste// tshes bcu bzhi la lha 'tshams yin// tshes bco lnga la de bzhin snor// 'di rin+da
294a1(mdo sde): / daphye bshad// yar gyi ngol snrums grub ste// tshes gcig la ni skye dbu srung // chos gnyis la ni chu stong yin// chos gsum la ni chu spang yin/ chos bzhi la ni
294a2(mdo sde): byi bzhin srungs// chos lnga la ni gro bzhin yin// chos drug la ni mon gru yin// tshes bdun la ni chu lha yin// tshes brgyad la ni khrums stong yin// tshes dgu la ni khrums spang
294a3(mdo sde): 'gro/ ches bcu la ni nam gru srung // de bzhin bcu gcig chos tha skar// gshin rje'i lha mo tshes bcu gnyis// tshes bcu gsum la me lha mo// tshes bcu bzhi la'ang snar ma yin// zla
294a4(mdo sde): ba rangs la mgo bshad// dgun zla ra ba'i zla ba 'dir// lha'i bla ma'i dar bu ste// 'di ni lhan cig byed par gzung // de bas bza' zhe sa bya bar bshad// de'i phyir nyin mo chos
294a5(mdo sde): bcu bzhir// yud tsam mtshan mo bcu drug ste// smin drug gis ni mtshan mo 'thob// snrums kyang nyi ma'i mdun na ste// grib tshe dgom pa brgyad yin zhing // nyi ma yongs
294a6(mdo sde): 'khor bar byed// lho phyogs nyi ma kha ltas 'khor// de bzhin rkun zla ra ba yi// zla 'dir khyim gzhi shes par bya// mar gyi dzin chos cig la// lag ni sgrub par byed pa yin// chas
294a7(mdo sde): gnyis la ni nab so ste// chos gsum rgyal du shes par gyis// 'dir tshes bzhi la'ang skag yin te// mchu yang chos ni lngal 'gro/ tshes drug la ni gre yin te// tshes bdun
294a8(mdo sde): la ni dngo yin bshad// ches brgyad la ni me bzhi yin// ches dgu la ni nag pa gnas// tshes bcu la ni sa ri 'gro/ tshes bcu gcig la sa ga 'gro// tshes bcu gnyis la'ang lha
294b1(mdo sde): 'tshams te// tshes bcu gsum la'ang snron yino// chos bcu bzhi la'ang snrums yin te// chos bcwo lnga la'ang chu snyed bshad// yar gyi ngo 'tshas gcig la// chu smad kyang
294b2(mdo sde): ni rung ba yin// tshes gnyis ji bzhin gro bzhin te// tshes gsum la ni mor gru 'gron/  tshes bzhi mon gre 'gror rung ste// ches lnga la ni khrums stong yin// ches drug la'ang khru
294b3(mdo sde): srung yin// chas bdun la ni nam gru 'gro// ches brgyad la ni tha skar rung // tshes dgu gshin rje'i lha mo yin// chos bcu smin drug 'gro rung ste// tshes bcu gcig la'ang sngar ma
294b4(mdo sde): yin// tshes bcu gnyis la'ang mgo yin te// tshes bcu ga sum la lag kyang 'gro// tshes bcu bzhi la nab so ste// zla ba nya la rgyal yang yin// zla ba nyang 'di la yang /

294b6(mdo sde): bar byed// mtshan mo yang ni ra gong shes gyis// nyi ma'i mdud du'ang gro bzhin te// grib tsho dgom pa bcu tham pa// nyi ma yongasu 'khor bar byed// 'jig rter mkhas pa rnams kyis
294b7(mdo sde): kyang // 'dir ni spen pa'i zhing bstan pa// 'di la mgo yin shes par gyis// zla ba gsum pa rnam bzhag nas// zla ba mar gyi chos cig la// skag ni sgrub par byed pa yin// chos
294b8(mdo sde): gnyis la ni mdur shes gyis// tshes gsum la ni gre yino// chos bzhi la ni dbo 'gro ste// chos lnga la ni me bzhi 'gro// chos drug pa ni rag pa sgrub// tshes bdun la ni sa ri
295a1(mdo sde): 'gro// tshes brgyang la yang sa ga ste// chos dgu la ni lha 'tshams yin// chos bcu la yang snron 'gro sde// tshes bcu gcig la sngams 'jug byed// ches ba
295a2(mdo sde): gnyis la chu stod yin// chos bcu gsum la chu srang yin// tshe sa bcu bzhi la byi bzhir ste// tshes bco lnga la gro zhir 'gro/ zla ba yar gyi chos gcig la// mor gru sgrub par
295a3(mdo sde): byed pa yin// chas gnyis la ni man gre ste// ches gsupa la ni khrums stong yin// ches bzhi la ni khrums spang yin// ches lnga la ni ram gru 'gro// ches drug lo mi
295a4(mdo sde): tshigs// chos bdur gshin rje'i lha mo lnga yin// de bzhin ches brgyad smin drug ste// ches dgu la ni snar ma 'gro/ che sa bcu la yang mgo yin te// lag ni
295a5(mdo sde): ches bcu gcig la 'gro/ tshes bcu gnyis la'ang nang so ste// tshes bcu gsum la rgyal yang yin// tshes bcu pa'i la'ang skag yin te// mchu ni zla ba rab rjeg
295a6(mdo sde): byed// dgur zla tha chung rang bzhir yang // mthar gyis kyang ni brjod par bya// lho'i phyogasu phyin nas kyang // nyi ma yongasu 'khor bar byed// mtshan mo bco brgyad shes par gyis
295a7(mdo sde): nyin par yang ni bcu gnyis yin// rgyal yang mtshan mo 'thob par byed// nyi ma'i mdumar mer gre yin// gri tshed kyang ni sor bdud yin// zhi ma yongasu 'khor bar byed/

295b8(mdo sde): mtshan mo thob par byed// nyir bar khrums stod 'gro bar byed// grib chod sor ni bcu gnyisu// nyi ma yongasu 'khor bar byed// zhing der lha yi bla ma yang // rnam par ba
296a1(mdo sde): / pa kho nar ni// bshad pa yin te 'dir yang ni// de ni mtshan mo 'byung ba yin// dpying zla 'bring po'i zla ba ngo'o// dang por chos gcig me bzhi ste// chos gnyis la na
296a2(mdo sde): nab pa yin// chos gsum la ni sa ri yin// chos bzhi la ni sa pa ste// ches lnga la ni lnga 'tshams yin// ches drug la ni sngon yin te// chos bdun la ni stangs yiro/

296b1(mdo sde): mtshan mo'ang bcu drug shes par gyis// gre dngos mtshan mo thob par byed// nyi ma'i mdur ra tha skar yin// gring tshod sor brgyad nyi ma 'khor// nyi ma'i bu ni rig dmar te// gza'
296b2(mdo sde): ro shin tu mi bzang yin// khyim lug la ni yang dag gnas// sprid zla tha chungs mar gyi ngo // dang po'i tshes gcig sa ri ste// tshes gnyis la ni sa ga ste// tshes gsum la ni lha

297a1(mdo sde): / pa ste// bco lnga bco lngar bshad pa yin// rag pas mtshan mo 'thob par byed// nyin par yang ri smin drug yin// grib tshong dag kyang gom pa drug/ nyi ma yongasu
297a2(mdo sde): 'khor bar byed// lha yi bla ma pa ba sangs// 'dir yang zhing zhes gdags pa yin// khyim glang yin te ma khas rnams kyi// zla ba bdun po bshad pa yin// dbyar zla rab mar gyi ngore// 
297a3(mdo sde): dang po tshes gcig lha 'tshams grub// tshes gnyis la ni sngon yin te// chos gsum la ni snrums yin// tshes bzhi la ri chu sted yid// ches lnga la ni chu smad yin// ches drug la ni bya
297a4(mdo sde): te// chos bdun pa 'i gre nar yin// chos brgyad la ni man gra // chas dgu la ni ma gre yin// chos bcul ni khrums steng mi na// chas bcu gcig la khrubs spang yas

297a6(mdo sde): la ni ma grub// chos gnyis la ni mgo yin te// chos gsum la ni lag yiro// chas bzhi la ni nab so ste// chos lnga la ni rgyal yin// chos drug la ni skag yin te// chos
297a7(mdo sde): bdud la ni mchu yin// tshes brgyad la ni gre yin te// chos dgu la ni dbo yin// chas bcul ni me bzhi ste// tshes bcu gcig la nag pa yin// tshis bcu gnyis pa sa ri se/ 
297a8(mdo sde): bcu gsum la sa ga yin// tshes bcu bzhi la lha 'tshams te// chos bco lnga la snan yin// dbye dra ba'i rims brjod bya// byang phyogs kha ltas si ma lakhor// 'phel byed nyin par
297b1(mdo sde): bcu drug tu// shes bya mtshan ma 'ang bcu bzhi yin// sags mtshan mo thob par byed// nyi ma'i mdun na mgo yin// gri 'chod gom pa bzhi yin// de ni yongasu 'khor bar byed// der shing
297b2(mdo sde): gza' ldag nyi mi'i bu// 'jam por byed pa'i gza' yin// sbyor ba khyim yin nyin par 'gro// brgyad pa yin par brjod pa yin// dbyar zla 'bring po'i chas gcig la// snrums ni sgrub pa
297b3(mdo sde): byed pa yin// chos gnyis la ni chu snod yin// chas gsum pa ni chu smad yin// ches bzhi la ni byi bzhin te// chos lnga la ni gro bzhin// chos drug la ni mnagru sde// chos bdun la ni
297b4(mdo sde): min gre yin// tshes brgyad la la ni khrums stong yin// tshes da gu la ni khrums smad yin// tshes bcu la ni nam bru ste/ tshes bcu gcig la tha skar yin// ches bcu
297b5(mdo sde): gnyis la bra nye ste// tshes bcu gsum la smin drug yin// ches pa cu bzhi la sngar ma ste// bco lnga la ni mgo yi no// de ni zla ba byed yin// zla ba yar gyi tshes gcig la/ 
297b6(mdo sde): lag ni sgrub par byed pa yin// chos gnyis la ni nang so yin// chos gsum la ni rgyal yin te// tshes bzhi la ni skag yino// chos lnga la ni mchu yin te// tshes drug la ni gre
297b7(mdo sde): yi no// chos bdud la ni dang yin te// tshes brgyad la ni me bzhi yin// ches dgu la ni nag pa ste// chos bcu la ni sa ri yin// chos bcu gcig la sa pa ste// chos bcu gnyis la
297b8(mdo sde): 'tshams yin// tshes bcu gsum la snron yin te// tshes bcu bzhi la snrums yin// h+la nya'i zla bar chu snod yin// bdag gis dbyar 'bring rims brjod bya// byang phyogs bzhin gyi dkyi
298a1(mdo sde): / 'khor lngas// nyi ma yongasu 'khor bar byed// nyin par yud tsam bcu bdun te// mtshan mo yang ni bcu gsum yin// sman gyis kyang ni mtshan mo thob// zin par bcas na rang
298a2(mdo sde): so yir// grib tshong gom pa gnyis yin te// nyi ma yongasu 'khor bar byed// zla ba zhes bya zhing yin te// lag dang yang dag ldan pa yi// 'dir khyim sbal pa zhes bya ba// rlung dbu par
298a3(mdo sde): bshang pa yin// dbyar zla tha chungs mar gyi ngo'i// ches gcig la ni chu slang sgrub// chos gnyis la ni byi bzhiran te// chos gsum la ni mor bu yin// chos bzhi la ni men gre ste// chos
298a4(mdo sde): lnga la re khrims stong sde// chos drug la ni khrubs spang yin// chas bdun la ni nam gru ste// tshes brgyad la ni tha skar yin// ches dbu la ne bra sa ste// tshes bcu la ni sngar drug min
298a5(mdo sde): chas bcu gcig la sngar ma ste// tshes bcu gnyis la ma go yin// tshes bcu gsum la lag yin te// chos du bzhi la rang se yin// chos bco lnga pa rgyal yin
298a6(mdo sde): dang de re zla ba byed yi ro// zla ba yar gyi tshes gcig la// skag ni sgrub par byed pa yin// chos gnyis la ni mchu yin// ches gsum la ni bre yin te// ches bzhi la ni dang yin// / 
298a7(mdo sde): ches lnga la ni me bzhi ste// chos drug la ni nag pa yin// chos bdun la ni sa ri ste// chos brgyad la ni sa ga yin// tshes dgu la ni lha 'tshams te// tshes bcu la ni sngon yin// 
298a8(mdo sde): chos bcu gcig la snrums yin te// tshes bcu gnyis la chu steng yin// chos bcu gsum la chu srang yin// tshes bcu bzhi la byi bzhin te// zla ba rangs la gro bzhi no// bdag gis pa
298b1(mdo sde): tha'i rims brjod bya// de bzhin byang gi phyogasu ni// nyi ma gdod byed ltas te 'khor// nyin par bco brgyad thong nas kyang // mtshan me yang ni bcu gnyis ste// chu snyed kyis ni mtshan ma
298b2(mdo sde): 'thob// nyi ma'i mdun namachu yin// gring tshong gom pa byed yin te// nyi ma yongasu 'khor bar byed// 'dir zheng nyi ma ldan pa yi// sas kyang gzer ni gtong bar byed// 'dir khyim
298b3(mdo sde): seng ger shes pa yin// ster zla ra ba'i mar gyi ngo'i// dang por tshes gcig mor gru sgrub// tshes gnyis la ni mor gre ste// tshes gsum la ni khrums stod yin// chos bzhi la ni khrums spang
298b4(mdo sde): chos lnga la ni nam gru ste// chas drug la ni tha skar yin/ chos bdun la ni bre zhe ste// tshes brgyad la ni smin drug yin// ches dgu la ni snang ma ste/ chos bcu la ni mgo che
298b5(mdo sde): ches bcu gcig la lag yin te// tshes bcu gnyis la nang so yin// tshes bcu gsum la rgyal yin te// chos brku ba ni la skrag yino// chos bco lnga la mchu yin
298b6(mdo sde): te dang de ni zlang byed yin// zla ba yang gyi chos gcig la// bre ni sgrub par byed pa ste// chos gnyis la ni dbo yi no// chos gsum la ni me bzhi ste// chos bzhi la ni nab pa ste/ 
298b7(mdo sde): lnga la ni sa ri sde// tshes drug la ni sa ga yin// tshes bdun la ni lha 'tshams ste// tshes brgyad la ni sngon yin// chos dgu la ni snrums yin te// ches bcu la ni chu snod yin// ches
298b8(mdo sde): bcu gcig la chu smang yin// gro zhin ji zhir tshes bcu gnyis// chos bcu gsum la mon gru ste// tshes bcu bzhi la mon gre yin// zla ba nying zla rangs la// drams sdong ces ri bya ba yin// 
299a1(mdo sde): // bdag gis sden zlar rim brjod// lho phyogs nyi ma'i 'khor la ldag/ nyin par yang ni bcu bdun ste// mtshan mo yang ni bcu gsum yin// gro zir gyis kyang mdza pa
299a2(mdo sde): nyi ma'i mdur rabre yin te// grib tshong dag kyang gom pa gnyis// nyi ma yongasu 'khor bar byed// zla bu gza' lhag ces bya ba// der ni zhing la yang dag gnas// der khyim bu mo banag
299a3(mdo sde): pa ste// zla ba bcu gcig bdag gis bshad// sngon zla 'bring ba'i mar gyi nga'i// dang por chas gcig khubs smang grub// chos gnyis la ni nam gru sde// res gsum li ne tha skar yin/ 
299a4(mdo sde): chas bzhi la ni bra zhe sngo// chos lnga la ni sprin drug ste// tshes drug la ni sngar ma yin// chos bdun la ni ge ye// ches rgyad la ni lag yin// chos dgu la renapa so yar// ches
299a5(mdo sde): la ni rgyal yin te// tshes bcu gcig la skrag yino// tshes bcu gnyis la mchu yin te// tshes bcu gsum la gre yi ro// chos bas bzhi la dpe yin de// ches
299a6(mdo sde): bco lnga la me bzhi yin// de ni zla ba byed yin te// zla yang cho sa gcig nag pa sgrub// tshes gnyis la ni sa ri ste// chos gsum la ni sa pa yin// chos bani la ni lnga 'tsha
299a7(mdo sde): dang chos lnga la ni snor yi'o// ches drug la'iri snrums yin te// chas bdun la'ini chu stod yin// tshes brgyad la ni chu smang yin// chos dgur byi bzhin gro ta// tshes bskul ni mon
299a8(mdo sde): gru yin// chos bcu gcig la man gre sde// tshes bcu gnyis la khrums stod yin// tshes bcu gsum la khrums spang yin// ches bcu bzhi la ram gra ste// zla rangs la tshangs tha
299b1(mdo sde): skar yin// sngar zla 'bring po'i ngo la ni// lo skar bdag gis brjod par bya// lho'i phyogasu kha ltas ste// nyi ma yongasu 'khor bar byed// nyin par bcu drug 'gro byed cing // mtshan ma
299b2(mdo sde): yang ri bcu bzhi yin// khrums sted kyis ni mtshan mo 'thob// nyi ma'i mdud na nag pa yin// grib tshod dag ni gro bzhin ste// nyi ma yongasu 'khor bar byed// lha yi b+h+ra ma spab sangs/ 
299b3(mdo sde): gza' ri zhing la rnam par gzhag/ 'dir khyim srang zhes bya ba bzhag/ zla ba bcu gnyis bshad pa yin// yongasu 'khor ba de yis ni// lo ni de ltar 'gro bar byed// mig stong yang dang
299b4(mdo sde): yang du re// 'dus te chos kyi phyogs la ltos// khyod ni shes rab gzhi yin na// chos ma yin pa'ang bzlog par gyis// chos gnas tshul khrims phun sum tshogs// thos phyag
299b5(mdo sde): pa bsam gtan ba// de dag khyed kyis chos gos dang // ga 'batung rnams kyis rjesu bsrungs// yang dag gnas te ba rgya byin gyis// rnga bong la ni thal sbyar ras// rab tu smra
299b6(mdo sde): ba bdag cag gi/ bya ba yang ni bsgo bar gyis// smras pa// lha yi bla ma khyod kyisu// rtag par tshangs par spyod pa srungs// rigs sngags sbar dang gsang sngags rngams// thams cad la
299b7(mdo sde): byang skangs// las kun drang srong zlang dang // zla ba chung dang zhag dang bzhi// bzo'i las kyis mtha' kun la// gtso bo yin par bkod pa yin// drag po drug gi snga can dang // dgon
299b8(mdo sde): ba dang ro lI ba ste// gnod sbyir ba'i po de dag ni// mchod sbyin rib mar gtso bor bkong // rgya mtsho chu lnga 'dzeg pa dang // rin cher spring dang ring du 'gro// sa yid chos dang zla srung
300a1(mdo sde): dang rang gnas thar byed pa rgya mtsho ni// gtser bar bzhag te ma dros dang // khab kyis lus 'bigs chu lngas byas// ri dgas 'khrug pa'ang klung de bzhin// klu rnams
300a2(mdo sde): kye ri gtso bor bkod// khyod re dge ba rab bskyed pa// rdo co yi ri khyad byed pa// mkhas pa zhing gi gtso bo ste// de 'dra ba ri ji lta ngur// khyod ni sdong po kho nas kyang // mi yi ra
300a3(mdo sde): par gtso ba ste// khyod de rlung dpang 'gul ma pa// rdu ni yang ba'i gas par yin// rdo rje'i mig dang seng po'i mil/ lags mthang la bar gdung bsum thabs/ lAm
300a4(mdo sde): bzhin po de dag ri// grong khyer gtso bor bkod pa yin// gong ma'i chags skyes cis mu khrud // 'khor lo sman pa gnod sbyin pa sa// de dag rin chen brtags pa la/ 
300a5(mdo sde): tshang byed pa'i gtso bor bkod// phyogs 'tshams ni bzhi yin te// srungs pa'i phyir ni yang dge garas// yu la 'khor grong khyer thams cadu// srung ba'i phyir ni 'byung
300a6(mdo sde): po bkod// drang srong dag ni thams cad dang // lha yi tshogs dang klu rnams dang // lha ma yin dang mi rnams kyi// bar yang rjesu yid rang byed// lus brtan rab tu rgyal ba mchog/ thub
300a7(mdo sde): ba yi ni gtso ba ste// khyod ni skye dang 'geg pa dang // zas dang ro dang me tog mchog/ khyod ni 'phel byed pa ste// shu dag rdzogs byed 'bras bu'i mchog/ khyed de lam de skyed
300a8(mdo sde): pa ste// rnam par 'tshe las rgyal ba'i gtso// dga' bo dang ni nye dga' gnyis// ri bo rnams kyi gtso bor bdakor// nor rgyas bu dang thang shing shing // lci mchog mig dmar dbugs byed
300b1(mdo sde): skye ma// khyod ni dbyangs can chu yi gtso// khyod ni grub dang yid 'phrog pa// zla ba 'phrog par byed pa ste// bcud kyi len gyi gtso bo yin// gza' dang rgyu skar dus kyang yin// khyim
300b2(mdo sde): rnams thams cad rnam par bzhag/ rgyal po chen po bzhi yang ni// skal lngar rgyur ni rnam par bzhag/ lus ngan gnod sbyin rnams kyi gtso// grul bum rnams kyi 'phags skye
300b3(mdo sde): bodang klu rnams kyi ni spyan mi bzang // dri za rnams kyi yul 'khor bsrung // thams cad kyi gling chen po bzhi// gleng gzhan brgyad khri thams cad// drang srong rnga bong gis gang
300b4(mdo sde): su skyong ba bkod par btang ba'i gnas ci yang med// der lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / med
300b5(mdo sde): mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang legs zhes bya ba byas par gyur to// drang srong rnga bong gi bya ba de la yang dag par rjesu yid rang bar gyur te// bya ba de na
300b6(mdo sde): mchod pa dang / rim gror bya bar so sor gnas par gyur to// de'i rje su shin tu yun ring zhig na// drang srong thub pa lam zhes bya ba byung ste// des kyang skar ma'i dpyad rab tu byas
300b7(mdo sde): zhag gis mi thub pa dang / shol yod par yang bshad// yang de'i tshe drang srong thub pa'i gnas rten ga la ba der klu thams cad 'dus te// de dag drang srong skar ma la dga' ba
300b8(mdo sde): la mchog tu bla ma la gus pa dang gces par byed pa skyes te// de la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir ci nu su brtson par gyur te// // 'phags pa 'dus pa chen po thabs
301a1(mdo sde): / pa chen po'i mdo las/ nyi ma'i snying po'i le'u bcu bcig pa las/ rgyu skar gyi sbyor ba rnam par bzhag pa'i le'u rdzog s+ho// // 'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i ste/ 
301a2(mdo sde): ra'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo// bam po bcu gcig pa'o// // rgya mtshos smras pa// na mkha' la ni rgyu skar tshogs// ji ltar bzhag pa bzhin du ni// khyod kyis sngon tshe tshe rangs dran/ 
301a3(mdo sde): mkhas khyod sring gsum kun gyi gtso// khyod kyi snying rje byams pa dper// shes gsal 'gro la snying brtse bzhin// kun dpal 'di nas khyod kyis ni// lag 'gro thams cad thar par
301a4(mdo sde): gyis// srid gsum tshul 'artul mtshungs med khyod// lag 'gro bde kun tshim byed khyod// khyod ni drang srong gyi bla// mi rnams kyis ni mchod par 'os// 'gro ba'i kun dpal khyod la ni/ 
301a5(mdo sde): lha dang lag 'gro gnod sprin tshegs// rten gyis yul rnams thams cad po// lag 'gro myur du thar par gyi den drang srong skar ma la dga' ba dkon mchog gsum la
301a6(mdo sde): mchog tu yid dang bskyed par 'dod nas de lta bu'i klu'i tshogs thams cad la shin tu rigs pa'i tshig snyan pa dag gis// 'di skad ces smraso// yon tan de 'dra bdag la med/ 
301a7(mdo sde): drang srong rnga bong bdag ma yin// khyed cag 'di nas thar byed par// bdag gis nus pa ma yin// gang gis bskal pa du mar ni// dka' thub dka' ba bzod pa spyad// khyed cag tha
301a8(mdo sde): bar byed pa yi// drang sro gzhan de lta bar gyis// rtag tu brtson zhing sbyin pa byin// mkhas shing glang chen rta dang ni// shing rta bu dang chung ma dang // nor gyis sems can par pa byas// 
301b1(mdo sde): lag mgo dang rna ba dang // mig dang spags pa khrag dang ni// bu bran bran mo bza' btung mang // mal cha kha zas sngon chad btang // snying rje dang ni byams pa yis// khyed cag thar byed
301b2(mdo sde): srid gsum na// mtshungs med bsam gtan dag 'byung ba// de ni drang srong rnga bong ste// kun tu brtse zhes byang chub sems// sngon chad ri dgas pa rol phyir// sems can mang po sdug
301b3(mdo sde): bsngal gyis// nyam thag pa ni thar bar byas// sems can gcig gi tshe du yang // sngon gyi tshe rabs de bskal par// dmyal bar 'gro bzod nges yi dgas// de ni 'jig rten sangs rgyas
301b4(mdo sde): byung // sems can sdug bsngal nyams thag kun/ sdug bsngal thar mdzad rnga bong yin// sems can smin byed dred brtson 'grus dang // snying rje brtan pos de srid 'khor// rnga
301b5(mdo sde): bang de ni sems pa na// rgyal sras bu ram shing pa yi/ rigasu zas gtsang gi ni sras// des ni bcas ma thag tu khyab// srid gsum bde 'byung 'jig rten dpal// yid 'di
301b6(mdo sde): rnam pa sna tshogs dang // lha dang klu yi sa rnams dang // 'byung po gnod spyir rgyal pos khyab// der ni mchod phyir thams cad lpags// des yis gom pa bdun bor te// ri dang rgya mtshor
301b7(mdo sde): bcas pa yi// sa ni thams cad 'khrugs par gyur// 'gro ba rga nang sdug bsngal dang // 'chibs gzir las ngas dgrol zhing // zhi ba bde ba mya ngan me// skam la dgod ces shAg sra
301b8(mdo sde): gsung // me tog dri dang rin chen dag/ lha klu rnams kyis gtor gyur cing // 'byung po'i tshogs rnams sna tshogs kyis// sras po la ni bstod gyur pa// bskal pa mang po du ma
302a1(mdo sde): sder pang khyed kyis dul ba dang // smin dang bsapa gtan dgyes la ngasar// sems can kun ched sdug bsngal bzod// 'di las skye ba 'di dang 'i// thams cad kyi ma
302a2(mdo sde): lag/ sdug bsngal thams cad 'i mdzad par// ring po mi thogs khyod 'ang rgya// des kyang dpa' bo bstan par gyur// mtshungs pa med bud med chags// drug khri tham pa spang nas/ 
302a3(mdo sde): spyod pa rab bsngar lo drug spyang // g.yo sgra can ri sder bcas pa'i// bdud ni gcig pus bcom nas kyang // byang chu zhi mchog gzhal med brnyes// mya ngan med lam don dang gzigs// 
302a4(mdo sde): byams dang ye shes thugs rje yis// sems can kun dang mi ma nyam zhing // 'byung po dag ni thams cad la// de ni byams pa'i thugs mnyam pa// sems can gang la'ang
302a5(mdo sde): mtho mi 'tshams// sems can thams cad sdug bsngal las// / thar par mdzad cing de yang ra// rnam bcings brtson ra thar mdzad pa// ma ga d+han de gnas shing // 'gro ba'i ra
302a6(mdo sde): rachos kyang ston// de la khyed kyis gsol pa thob// byams pa'i yid kyis rnam par ltos// drang srong mchog gi thadra deng // 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad las// khyed cag ye
302a7(mdo sde): thar par byed// rang nyid kyang ni 'dong bar gyis// dga' rachog bde ba 'dod rnams kyis// phyin chad mkha' lding thams cad las// 'jigs pa khyed la mi 'byung // rtag bde sdug bsngal
302a8(mdo sde): dral dgar gyis// btsor ra 'di na ga yi smras ro// bdud ni khyed la rnam par 'tshe// ji ltar nga yis bshad pa bzhin// thams cad kyang ni gzung bar gyis// yang de'i tshe drang srong
302b1(mdo sde): thub pa'i gnas rten du klu dang klu chen po po dang mo dang // khye'u dang / bu mo gang dag thams cad 'dus pa de dag thams cad kyis thal mo rab tu sbyar te// 'di skad ces smras// 
302b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa// chos thams cad kyi dbang gi pha rol tu phyin pa// sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal sel bar mdzad pa// ngade thams
302b3(mdo sde): cad sbyin par mdzad pa// dga' nga thams cad bskyed par mdzad pa// shes rab thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa// rtag tu byams pa'i thugs dang ldan pa// thugs thams cad kyis khyad pa/ 
302b4(mdo sde): 'phrin las thams cad sgrub par mdzad pa// khams cad sdor pa// yang dag pa'i mig gsung ba// lnga dang klu rnams kyis mchod pa la phyag 'tsha'o// phyag 'tshalo// srid gsum gyi dgra
302b5(mdo sde): bcom pa mchod pa thams cad 'os pa bdag cag thams nga sdug bsngal zhing brtson ra 'dir 'phangs lagasar// 'di nas bdag cag thar par mdzad par gsol/ 
302b6(mdo sde): de dag lhan cig gnas par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi klu de dag thams cad sngor gyi lus kyi gzugs ji lta ba bzhin du bkod de gnas de nas 'gro bar ni ma ruso// de dag thams
302b7(mdo sde): kyis drang srong skar pa la dpa' ba la smras pa// de bzhin gshegs pa de ni dader te// sems can thams cad la bde bar bzhed pa rnam par mi 'che ba'i chos nyid yidado// de la bdag
302b8(mdo sde): cag sbyangasu nye bar gnas// 'di nas myur du bzhud cig/ bdud kyi 'ching ba 'di las bdag cag thar par mdzod cig/ skar ma la dga' bas 'di skad ces smraso// de bzhir gshegs pa
303a1(mdo sde): / srong sems can thams cad la phan pa dang // bde ba'i phyir snying rje chen po'i rgyu mthun thams cad mkhyen pa thub pa des// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
303a2(mdo sde): rnams la 'khor ba'i 'khor lo rnam par ldog par bya ba'i phyir dang / byang chub kyis lam rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir dang / rgyu dang 'bras bu'i sems can yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir
303a3(mdo sde): zhes bya ba nas// sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi bar du thob par bya ba'i phyir/ dang por ma byung ba la dmigs pa dang / nyan thos dang / thun mong ba sems can la dmigs pa'i gnas mtsha/ 
303a4(mdo sde): bstan to// yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po slob dpon la rag las pa rnams la// rgyu las yang dag par drung ba dang // so sor brtag pa la dmigs
303a5(mdo sde): pa tshangs pa'i gnas pa bstan to// da ltar de bzhin gshegs bde ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+ga'i klung gi byer snyed grangs med pa/ dpag tu med pa rdul pa rab kyi rdul snyed pa/ dz+ra/ 
303a6(mdo sde): pa bla ra red pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongasu rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las bsgral ba'i
303a7(mdo sde): phyir dang / bdud bzhi 'ardul ba'i phyir dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir// chos kyi khrus mdzad// da ltar shin tu kun tu rtog pa'i nyon mongs tshogs kyi
303a8(mdo sde): sems can gyi khams la dmigs pa kun nas ldang ba med pa// rgyu ba med pa/ gzhi med pa/ mtshan nyid med pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ chags pa med pa/ rnam par bzhag pa med pa/ 
303b1(mdo sde): rdul med pa mun pa med pa snang ba med pa/ gzung ba med pa/ gsal byed med pa/ spyod pa med pa/ tha ma dang pa nyid ces bya ba nas/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / 'byung po
303b2(mdo sde): thams cad dang / mig gi rang bzhin tshor ba po med pa'i srid pa zhes pa'i bar nas/ yid kyi rang bzhin tshor ba med pa'i sred pa'i bar la smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa
303b3(mdo sde): med pa dang / 'jug pa med pa'i chos dbyings dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / de bzhin nyid 'dres pa med pa dang / gang 'jug pa med pa'i chos dbyings de na
303b4(mdo sde): dam pa stong pa nyid dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i chos thams cad maHma pa nyid kyis sgrol ba phyed pa'i ye shes kyi spyod pa dang ldan pa/ yang dag pa la dmigs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
303b5(mdo sde): 'di ri/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// pha rol tu byin pa drug gi spyod pa dag la yongasu sbyang ba byas pa/ sems na mkha' dang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa/ 
303b6(mdo sde): ma chags pa'i ye shes mnyam pa nyid thob pa/ lta ba thams cad bag chags kyi nyon mongs pa yang dag par bcom pa rnams la/ tshangs pa'i gnas pa dmigs pa med pa sten pa
303b7(mdo sde): kye drang srong skar ma la dga' bas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na yang / klu'i rgyal po lus 'bigs pa'i khab ces bya ba dang / klu yi rgyal po zla ba la gtsub pa zhes bya ba dang / klu
303b8(mdo sde): yi rgyal po rin cher skyong zhes bya ba de dag/ byang chub kyi spyod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba/ sngon bstsags pa'i smon lam yang dag par rjesu dran pas/ de dag sdang ba dang / rnam par bgying ba da
304a1(mdo sde): / ldan pa'i gzungs thod par gyur to// de'i cha klu gzhan brgyad cu rtsa bzhi ni/ byang chub kyi spyod pa'i dge ba'i cang sngoran bstsags pa'i smon lam yang dag par rjes dran pas
304a2(mdo sde): byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i tinge 'dzin thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' skar pa la dga' ba la/ de dag gis 'di skad ces smra so// khyod gzhung la snying rje cher po thob pa
304a3(mdo sde): gang gis/ 'dir bdag cag bdud kyi 'ching ba 'di las yongasu thar par bgying ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po thod pa de la/ bdag cag gi tshig gis gsel ba theb shig
304a4(mdo sde): de bzhin du bya'o zhes smras nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dga' ba/ 'khor drang srong stong phrag mang po dang / de nas rdzu 'phrul gyis song // / 
304a5(mdo sde): 'phags pa 'dus pa chen po nya pa'i snying po'i le 'u bcu gcig pa las le'u brgyadado// / bcom ldan 'das la klu thams cad sgrubasu nye dang gnas
304a6(mdo sde): par bdud sdig can gyis thos te/ shas cher 'khrugs shing srag la/ rgya shug gi 'dab ma bzhin du/ lus rab tu 'ang zhing lus rdul nas lag pa gnyis sgreng ste/ 'di skad ces smras
304a7(mdo sde): lag 'gro skyabs ni sgrubasu dong // skye dgu thams cad slongs gyur cing // 'chi med lam la gzhog byed pa// mi bzad g.yo sgra can la ltos de'i tshe bdud kyi bu mo// dran bral ma zhes
304a8(mdo sde): bya ba des// 'di skad ces smras// sems can gang dag thos tsam gyis// dge sbyong la ni skyab su mchis// gang dag de yi tshi ga thos shing // de mthong ba lnga smos ci 'tshal// bcom
304b1(mdo sde): bsnga chags sbyang ba yin// khyod kyis yun ni ring du gzigs// bka' mchid sna tshogs ldan cig mdzad// de yi spyan ma spabs sam// bdud kyis slad smras pa// dge sbyong
304b2(mdo sde): tar brtan pa yin// rang bzhin mkhas pa chen po ste// stong pa'i chos la yang dag zhugs// rgal nas skye dgu sgril bar byed// bral mas smras pa// stong pa la ni gang shugs
304b3(mdo sde): padang bdud rnams bye bas ma bskyod// byang grol bde ba sbyin bgyid pa// de la bdag ni skyabasu 'chi// mtshan nyid ma mchis ldan pa yi// de bzhin nyid la gang brten cing // ye shes
304b4(mdo sde): kyi ni pha rol phyin// de la bdag ni skyabasu 'chi/ rgyu de bdag gis bslab par bgyi// sems can thams cad rnam par grol// chos rnams kun la dbang sgyur ba'i// 
304b5(mdo sde): bla med sangs rgyas grub par shog/ bdud kyi bu me lnga brgya snyed bdud kyi gnas der 'khod nas// byang chub tu smon lam btab par gyur te// bdung sdig can shes
304b6(mdo sde): sa 'khrugs shing dang ste// rmongs nas/ skabs kyi shugs kyis 'chag sar zhugs te/ bdud kyi stobs kyi cho 'phrul gyis byir gyis brlab de lta du byir gyis brlangs// gang gis
304b7(mdo sde): drang srong skar ma la dga' ba de nas ring po ma lon par// drang srong thub pa'i gnas rten der bdud kyi gnas de nas// na mkha' las rdo'i char pa me rab tu 'bar ba'i char mngon
304b8(mdo sde): par rab tu dbang par brtsams te// klu thams cad thal bar rlag par 'dod na// bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus der me tog gi char rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu bang ste// klu thams cad
305a1(mdo sde): rab tu dpa' bar gyur to// dga' khyad mas smras pa/ kye bdud kyi bu mo dag khyod ltos shig/ 'dzaram bu'i gling der dpe sbyong po'u dpa la klu gang rab skangs dong pa
305a2(mdo sde): ngag thams cad kyang 'dir sdug bsngal mang pos gnod par byed na/ gang dag 'dir 'khod nas// dge sbyong go'u ta ma la skyangasu dong ba/ rang gi bu mo khyod la lta smos kyang ci dgos// 
305a3(mdo sde): bdud kyi bu mos 'di skad ces smra so// sangs rgyas skyabasu sems can su 'gro ba// bdud rnams bye bas gsad par mi rus te// tshul khrims nyams shing blo ni 'khrugs zin kyang
305a4(mdo sde): de ni nges par skye ba'i pha rol 'gro// ston pa la ni me tog gaHga gter zhing // byang chub smon lam brtan po bskyed pas na// de ni bdud rnams du mas gsad pa
305a5(mdo sde): nus// nam nur med par 'jig rten sangs rgyas 'gyur// de yi bslab pa'i gzhi ni gcig blangs shing // tshig gi don gcig tsam yang nyan byed na// byang chub phyir ni se
305a6(mdo sde): kyang skyed pa de// sems can kha lo sgyur 'gyur nem nur med// yab klu tshogs 'di mthong ste sangs rgyas kyis// der ni me tog char pa sna tshogs 'bebs// sangs rgyas yul
305a7(mdo sde): bcig gis ni khyod la bsngos// der na ci yang nus par gyur to// gang gis sems can de dag sdig zad cing // bdag cag gi ni las kyi sgrib 'byang ba// chung ngu lung bstan pa ni
305a8(mdo sde): de nyam pa'i// rig pa gcig kyang der ni ston pas gsungs// bdud sdig can shas cher la drags shing gshe ste// sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ba skyes nas// mya ngan gyi khang pa
305b1(mdo sde): gcig pu 'dug/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dga' ba// bcom ldan 'das kyi tshangs pa'i gnas pa dmigs pa med pa'i gtam gyi tha mar 'jug
305b2(mdo sde): su bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa der phyin te 'dug// bcom ldan 'das ga la ba zhes bya ba nas// bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dag
305b3(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la bgyid pa'i gzungs sngags bshad par gsol// gzungs kyi gsang
305b4(mdo sde): sngags kyi gzhi de dgis sngon bdag cag gnyis bram ze'i khye'u gnyisu gyur pa na// lus kyi sngang rgyal po rgyal gyi lha la nongs pa bgyis pas dgum pa la thug ste// brtson rang sal
305b5(mdo sde): nas// zla ba phyed zas dang bral zhing // bcing ba lngas bcings nas// / de bzhin gshegs pa man 'da' ra ba'i bsung la la yid la gzhan mi sems par gsol ba btang pa
305b6(mdo sde): lag so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa man 'da' ra ba'i bsung bdag cag la thugs brtse bas rang gi gnas shul kar bzhugs nas// sangs rgyas kyi yul rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phral
305b7(mdo sde): lung bstan pa de lta bus/ bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yod la dgyid pa'i gzungs sngags bstan te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus btsan ra der bdag cag gi rna lam du don dang bcas/ 
305b8(mdo sde): tshig 'bru dang bcas par gragaso// gsang sngags yid la 'gyid pa de dag gis/ bdag cag dga' ba dang dad pa yang dag par bskyed nas/ de'i tshe bdag / bag gi mthong ba'i chos
306a1(mdo sde): / la myong bar 'gyur ba thams cad dang / skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba thams cad dang / lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba thams cad dang / las kyi sgring pa thams cad
306a2(mdo sde): dang / non mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgring pa dang / sems can gyi sgrib pa dang / sbyin pa'i sgrib pa zhes bgyi ba nas/ shes rab kyi sgrib pa zhes dgye ba'i bar dang / nye bar spyod pa dang / 
306a3(mdo sde): longs spyod kyi sgring pa dang / tshe'i 'du byed pas pa'i sgrib pa dang / bsams bzhin du srid par skye ba'i sgrib pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag pa rnamasu 'gro ba'i sgrib pa yongasu ngas
306a4(mdo sde): shing / dem bdag cag bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la bgyid pa'i gzus sngags thos patsam gyi mdo la/ 'grin pa 'ching ba lnga las grol te/ bcin ra nas/ rdzu phra
306a5(mdo sde): gyi yul thod par gyur cing / de nas na mkha' las chas/ ba com ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa man da ra ba'i gsu nga gi tha du nye bar phyin to// de ras shi 'phos nas
306a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing ri de'i 'od ces bgyi bar skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi mdog gi tha du rab tu byung nas zhes bgyi ba nas/ slar chad bskal pa dpag
306a7(mdo sde): tu ma mchis par/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa rnamasu bdag cag ma skyes zhes pa'i bar du'o// de bzhin du da ltar sgrib par sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed thams cad 'di dang 'og
306a8(mdo sde): min la thug pa'i bar gyis thams cad/ sems can mi dang mi ma lags pa dpag tu ma mchis pas byang ste/ de dag ni las kyi sgringab pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / chos
306b1(mdo sde): kyi sgrib pa dang / sems can gyi bsgrib pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis zin to zhes bgyi ba nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag pa rnamasu las yongasu ma dag pa dag gis bsgrengs te
306b2(mdo sde): 'chi bar mi nus pa lagaso zhes bgyi ba'i bar du'o// sems can gyi las kyi gzungs sngags thos ma thag tu/ sems can rnams kyi mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba dang / lan
306b3(mdo sde): grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba dang / las kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / sems cad gyi sgrib pa dang / sbyin pa'i sgrib pa zhes
306b4(mdo sde): bgyi ba nas/ shes rab kyi sgrib pa zhes bgyi bar dang / nye bar spyod pa dang / longs spyod kyi sgrib pa dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi sgrib pa mchis pa'i thams cad dang
306b5(mdo sde): thos ma thag tu skye ba'i sgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag pa dag tu 'gro ba'i sgrib pa mchis pa thams cad yongasu bas par 'gyur ba dang / chos bstan
306b6(mdo sde): pa des sems can rnams bzod pa dang / ting 'dzin rnam pa sna tshogs thob par 'gyur ba dang / ji srid 'tsho ba'i mtha'i bar du der 'chi ba'i dus bgyis nas// sems can rnams
306b7(mdo sde): ji ltar bsams pa bzhin du/ bsams bzhin du srid par skye ba len par rngo thogs par 'gyur ba dang / tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ba dang / rtag par rgyun tu brtson 'bras brtsams
306b8(mdo sde): ba dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par len pa dang / log par mi ltung ba'i chos can rnamasu 'gyur ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug la mngon par brtson pa dang / 
307a1(mdo sde): bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la mngon par brtson pa dang / chos nyan pa dang / dge 'dun la rim gro dbyed dang / bsam gtan gyis rnam par rol pa dang / rangon par shes
307a2(mdo sde): ba dang / tshangs pa'i gnas pa bsgom pa la mngon par brtson par 'byur ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad/ bla na med pa'i yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du chos de dag dang bral
307a3(mdo sde): bar mi 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das de sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba'i sladadu/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das zhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la bgyid pa'i gzungs sngags
307a4(mdo sde): de legs par bshad par gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis ba ka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gang khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa legaso zhes bya ba ras/ bcom
307a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba'i bar du/ dge slong ngam/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can su la la theg pa gsum las/ theg pa gang yang
307a6(mdo sde): rung ngas srid pa'i rgya mtsho las rgal bar 'dod pa de ni myur du theg pa yongasu rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pa yin la/ sdug bsngal thams cad 'joms par 'dod yin/ thos pa thams
307a7(mdo sde): cang kun tu 'dzin par 'dod pa yin// lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi gnas ngan len thams cad la yongasu thar par 'dod pa yin// bstan pa bsrung bar 'dod pa yin/ snyan
307a8(mdo sde): ba 'dod pa dang / rnyed pa 'dod pa dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba mang po 'dod pa dang / dbang phyug 'dod pa dang / gzugs 'dod pa dang / stobs 'dod pa dang / 'khor 'dod pa dang / 
307b1(mdo sde): nang dang / 'bru 'dod pa dang / thu bo 'dod pa dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad kyis mtshang bar 'os par 'dod pa yin// rtag tu lus 'dod pa yin/ rtag tu lus dang / ngag dang / 
307b2(mdo sde): yid kyis kun tu gnon par 'dod pa yin zhing myur du ngasam gtan dang / ting 'dzin dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / tshangs
307b3(mdo sde): pa'i gnas pa dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa rnam pa sna tshogs bsgrub par 'dod pa yino// de ltar yang las kyi sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa shas cher 'phongs pa
307b4(mdo sde): rnam pa sna tshogs kyis shes bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gro ba'i sgrib pa rnams kyis bsams bzhi na du srid pa blangs pa de'i bar gyis/ myur du dge
307b5(mdo sde): nga'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs de lta bu de dag bsgrub par mi dus te/ las kyi spring pa de lta bu de dag gis zin pa'i phyi ra// gang zag de khras byas te gos gcing ma 'a
307b6(mdo sde): shing / khwa zas gtsang ma dang / mal gtsang ma der skyil mo krung ngam/ 'chag pas kyang rung ste/ rdza su 'thun pa'i chos brgyang la sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs yid la byed pas/ 
307b7(mdo sde): yid la mi sems par bya ba nas/ las gzhan mi byed cing sems rnam par g.yengs pa ma yin par bar gyis/ re shig mtshan gcig gam zhes bya ba nas/ mtshad bdun gyi
307b8(mdo sde): bang du banas par byed na/ des rang gi sku byang sangs rgyas mthong zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// gal te sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs chu ngur rtog par byang na/ chung ngu kho na ra mthong // yang na
308a1(mdo sde): // chang med par rtogs par byed na/ gzugs kyi sku tshad med pa yang dag par rje su mthong // des ratshan thog thag mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mthong // mtshar gang las
308a2(mdo sde): ngag sngon po'i 'od 'phro ba mthong ba'i mtshan gcig po de nyid la yid kyis rjesu bltas nas/ gsang sngags 'di dag brjod// tangad+ya thA/ badz+ri ma b+ha/ badz+rI pa tha/ ud pA dA dA ya/ badz+ri
308a3(mdo sde): thA/ snga bapar/ u nu ra ta thAt+ta/ b+hU ta koT+Ta/ badz+ri ma b+ha swAhA// ji sri ngas khadag rdzid po'i 'ad 'bro ba rnam par spen ras/ de ras byung ste rang gi mtho'i spyi bar zhugs pa de sri nges
308a4(mdo sde): patshan gcig la rnam par mi ga yang ba'i yid kyis rje su bltas nas/ tshig 'di dag brjod cing mi skrag par bya// mi dngang par bya'o// rang gi lus mer rnam par blta bar bya ste/ 
308a5(mdo sde): ji ltar zhe ra/ des kha dog sngon po'i 'od 'phro ba rang gi lus kyi yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad 'gro ba mthong nas/ rang gi lus thams cad rab tu 'bar bar mtho
308a6(mdo sde): zhes bya ba ras/ thal ba bzhin du mthong zhes bya ba'i bar dang / phyogs bzhir rlung gis ma lus par khyer ba stong pa bzhin du mthong zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ phyogs thams cad de la
308a7(mdo sde): gzugs sdang bya gang yang mi 'jung ba 'di ni de'i thams cad sgrud pa yin// rigs kyi bu su la la sangs rgyas rje su dran pa de lta bu bzhi ba rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la byed pa'i gzungs
308a8(mdo sde): sngags shin tu bsgoms shing / mchod sbyin legs par byas la/ shin tu yid la byas nas/ de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa zhes bya ba nas/ 
308b1(mdo sde): ma lus pa'i bar du yongasu byang bar 'gyuraro// 'tshams med pa'i las rnams dang / dam pa'i chos spangs pa rnams dang / 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa rnams ni ma gtog so// de 'dod
308b2(mdo sde): na de ltar nyin mtshan gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi gsung thams cad dang / phyi rol pa'i bstan bcos thams cad/ rig pa'i gnas bco brgyad dang / gzhan yang gang dag stan dang gsu byas
308b3(mdo sde): pa'i rnams des the tsom med par shin tu 'dzin par 'gyuraro// de nyin mtshan gcig gis bsam gtan bzhi dang / gong ma rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi dang / so so
308b4(mdo sde): yang dag pa rig pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bani sgom par 'dod na/ des shin tu bsgoms pa yin// de 'dod na skad cig gcig gis sems can thams cad
308b5(mdo sde): kyi dus gsum gyi 'gro ba'i 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba dang / sems kyi spyod pa rab tu shes par 'gyuraro// de 'dod na skad cig gis na mkha' thams cad rang gi lus sam/ sangs
308b6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi sku 'am/ brgya byin gyi bar ma/ tshangs pa'i bar ram/ sred med kyi bu'i bar ma/ dbang phyug chen po'i bar ma/ rgyal chen bzhi'i bar ma/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'i bar ma/ chu'i bar ma/ 
308b7(mdo sde): me'i bar ram/ sa'i bar gyis gang bar byed// de 'dod na skad cig gcig gis na mkha' thams cad me tog gis bar dang / rin po che'i 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / gdugs dang
308b8(mdo sde): rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / ras btsos bu dang / chos gos dang / rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyi bar dag gis gang bar byed// sus bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la byed pa sang+yas
309a1(mdo sde): rjesu dran pa de lta bu shin tu bsgoms pa yin zhing / shin tu 'dris par byas la/ shin tu yid la byas pa yin pa de'i las chad med pa de lnga bu ra lus par byang ba
309a2(mdo sde): 'gyuraro// de de ltar bsod nams dang / spobs dang / brtson 'bras dang / ting 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa dang / rnam par rol pa dang / mngon dar shes par chad med par 'gyu
309a3(mdo sde): ngas de ltar gang yang rung ba dag yongasu rdzogs par byas na/ myur du 'khor ba las thar par 'gyur te/ 'tshams med pa byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / 'phags pa la
309a4(mdo sde): skur pa 'debs pa rnams ni ma gtog so// de lta yir yang 'tshams med pa byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa de yang / bdun drag
309a5(mdo sde): bdun du bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la byed pa// sangs rgyas rje su dran pa 'di 'dir ji ltar bstan pa bzhir sgom par byed ra/ bdun phrag bdun po de 'das ras/ 
309a6(mdo sde): las kyi sgrib pa srung cha ma zad cing / lhag ma skyen med par ma lus par byang bar 'gyur// bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la byed/ sangs rgyas rjesu drar bsgom pa de lnga bu de de de
309a7(mdo sde): lngang ngor cheng yire// su la la bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la byed pa/ sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa 'di de ltar thos pa tsam rna lam du thos ra/ da la mi 'ang/ mi ma yin pa
309a8(mdo sde): ngar nge nye bar brtags nas dang pa dang / dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba skye'o// de brtson ra'i 'ching ba dam po las yongasu thar par 'gyuraro// gang su dag sdug bsngal bar gyur pa'i
309b1(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyang / sdug bsngal dag las yongasu thar par 'gyur ro// longs spyod kyi sdug bsngal dang / chang pa dang / brdeg pa dang / g.yang sa dang / me dang / chu dang / dug dang / 
309b2(mdo sde): dgra thams cad dang / 'brang po thams cad dang / nad kyi 'jigs pa dang / gnas kyi 'jigs pa dang / rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang zhes bya ba nas/ bran gyi 'jigs pa zhes bya ba'i bar
309b3(mdo sde): dang / ngar 'gror 'gro ba'i 'jigs pa zhes bya ba'i bar las yongasu thar par 'gyur ro// bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur// su sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa de lta bu thos pa tsam rna lam du grags na
309b4(mdo sde): de la nye bar brdabs nas dang pa skyes te/ de ltar don che zhing phan yod che ba yin// su ji ltar bstan pa bzhin de bzhin du sgom pa lnga smos kyang ci dges/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
309b5(mdo sde): bshad par sngor yongs spyang nga spyad pa/ dkrigs pa khrag khrig brgya stong brgyad cu rtsa drug ni/ sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa'i ting 'dzin thob par gyur to// ji ltar sngar
309b6(mdo sde): bshad pa bzhin du yon tan de dag dang yang ldan par gyur to// de'i tshe srog chags khrag khrig brgyad cu rtsa bzhi ni sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa thod par gyur to// de'i
309b7(mdo sde): sems can dpag yas pa kha cig ni mthar gyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor dang / 'bras bu dang po gnas par gyur to// kha cig ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar thob par gyur
309b8(mdo sde): do dang de'i tshe sems can dpag yas pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sngon ma bskyed pa'i sems bskyed// mur dral ma la sogs pa bdud kyi dra me lnga
310a1(mdo sde): / brgya po dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus bdud kyi gnasu 'khod bzhin sems yongs sbyang ba yi sangs rgyas rjes dran pa'i lung bstan pa 'di thams cad thos/ 
310a2(mdo sde): thas nas kyang bud med kyi dngos po mi snang bar gyur te/ skyes pa nyid thob// gang dag sngon yongasu spyad pa byas pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas rjesu drar ba'i ting 'jen dang ldan par gyur to// 
310a3(mdo sde): ji skad sngar bshad pa bzhin du yon tan de dag dang ldan par gyur to// de dag thams cad tshangs pa chen po'i cha byang bdag nyid mngon par sprul ras/ tshangs pa chen po re re yang byed
310a4(mdo sde): brgya stong phrag mang pos yongasu bskor cing / bye ba brgya stong phrag mang pos 'dun gyis bltas te/ sil sA ra dang / pheg rdod pa bye ba ngargya phrag mang pos yongasu bskor ras/ de ba
310a5(mdo sde): bdud kyi gnas bsam gyis mi khyab pa bkod pa nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi tha du babs te/ bcom ldan 'angs de la lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / 
310a6(mdo sde): drug pa dag dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan ngag dang / rin po che'i ras bcos bu dang / chos gos sna tshogs gtor cing / mngon par gtor te/ bcom ldan 'das la
310a7(mdo sde): lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod// 'phags pa 'dus pa chen po nyi ma'i snying po'i le'u
310a8(mdo sde): bcug cig pa las/ sangs rgyas rjes dran pa'i le'u ste dgra pa/ rdzogs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'/ 
310b1(mdo sde): po skar ma la dga' ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu lag 'gro'i tshogs thams cad kyi zhal lta byos shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyon mongs
310b2(mdo sde): pa med pa'i sems kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dus lags kyis gshegs shig/ bcom ldan 'das gang khyod kyi mdzad pa mdzod cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
310b3(mdo sde): stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gang de bzhin gshegs pas lag 'gro'i las bstan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongasu 'byang ba lung bstan pa bshad pa rab tu bstan pa'i dus yi no// yang
310b4(mdo sde): de'i tshe lha thams cad ces bya ba nas/ grul bum thams cad ces bya ba'i bar dag me tog dang / spos dang / rin po che dang / ras bcos bu dang / chos gos dang / rgyar dang / sprad pa dang / 
310b5(mdo sde): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi chang pa dag rab tu 'bebs shing / sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi sgra 'byin la mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad kyis
310b6(mdo sde): bsngags pa'i yon tan gyis bsdad nas/ bcom ldan 'das gdan las mngon par bzhengs te/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab ga la bar byang phyogasu nye bar gshegaso// 'dod pa ra spyod pa dang / bzu
310b7(mdo sde): na spyod pa'i lha thams cad kyis kyang / gang bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis bdun du 'dar cing / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyis yongasu bskor te/ ri rab kyi
310b8(mdo sde): mor gshegs pa'ang bzhed par sheso// de ltar rig nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ ras b.ras pa sna tshogs dang
311a1(mdo sde): / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i me tog bkrab pa'i them skas sprul nas 'di skad ces gsel to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi them skas las gshegs par gsol// lnga'i bu
311a2(mdo sde): bzhar 'phral rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir 'jam bu chu bo'i gser gyi them skas tsan dar sbrul gyi snying po'i phye ma sna tshogs bkram pa dag sprul nas/ 'di skad ces gsel
311a3(mdo sde): dang bcom ldan 'das bdag gi them skas rnams la gshegs par gsol/ lha'i bu 'phrul dgas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir/ lha rdzas kyi gser gyi thim skas can ngar sa ma ba
311a4(mdo sde): sna tshogs bkrab pa sprul nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi them skas las gshegs par gsol/ lha'i bu yongasu dga' ldar gyis bcom ldan 'das
311a5(mdo sde): kyi phyir/ lnga rdzas kyi bai der+ya'i them skas dus kyi rjesu 'brang ba'i tsar dar gyi phye ma sna tshogs bkram pa sprul nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bang gi
311a6(mdo sde): them skas las gshegs par gsol// lha'i bu rab 'thab bral gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir/ lha rdzas kyi bai dUr+ya'i tham skas/ lha rdzas kyi phye ma sna tshogs bkram pa sprul nas/ 'di
311a7(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi them skas las gshegs par gsol/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir mu tig dar ra pi'i ther
311a8(mdo sde): skas lnga rdzas kyi can ngan gyi phye ma sna tshogs dang / rin po che'i dra ba sna tshogs kyis yongasu khebs pa sprul nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi them skas lnga
311b1(mdo sde): gshegs par gsal/ rgyal po chen po bzhis kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir/ lha rdzas kyi ring po mardo'i snying po las byas pa lnga rdzas kyi ras bcas bu sna tshogs kyis rab tu khebs pa'i
311b2(mdo sde): them skas de nyid sprul ras 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi them skas las ri rab kyi rtse mor gshegs par gsol/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po bzhi 'khor dang bcas
311b3(mdo sde): pas kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir lha rdzas kyi sdug gi them skas lha rdzas kyi gser gyi phye ma sna tshogs kyis yongasu khebs pa de nyid sprul nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
311b4(mdo sde): 'das bdag cag gi them skas las ri rab kyi rtse mor gshegs bar gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de dag la thugs brtse nas/ bdag nyid 'dun pas bdag dang 'dra ba sangs
311b5(mdo sde): rgyas kyi sku bdud sprul ras/ sangs rgyas brgyad po de dag lha'i dab nga po dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po thams cad kyi mdun du nyan thos kyis mdun du 'dar cing / byang chub sems
311b6(mdo sde): dpa'i dge 'dun gyis yongasu bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das bkod pa chen po de lta bu ri rab kyi rtse mor gshegasaso// sangs rgyas brgyad po de dag mchog du lhar lhang ri rab kyi rtse mor bzhugs
311b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi sku re re las 'od kyi 'od gzer 'di lta bu byung ste/ dper na/ zla ba dang / nyi ma bye ba brag stong shar ba bzhi no// klu gang dag drang srong thub pa'i gnas rten du lhags pa de
311b8(mdo sde): dag thams cad kyis/ de mthong nas kyang ljang mor gyur te/ gcig la gcig dris pa/ snang ba chen po'i nang na rten pa ri rang kyi rtse mo la gnas pa brgyad po de dag pa las 'ongs
312a1(mdo sde): / dga' bo dang / nye dpa' gnyis kyis smras pa/ ri rang rtse la lha rnams ldan cig mas pa'i mdun na 'don pa 'di gnas pa// kun mchog lnga yi dbang phyug shin tu ra
312a2(mdo sde): pa rnams kyi rig pa'i pha rol phyin// bdag cag la ni brtse bas 'dir gnas dpal gyi baji brjid kyis ni longs spyod byed// 'ching ba rnams las thar bar byed kyis kun kyang de la
312a3(mdo sde): ra bo nges phyag 'tshal cig/ ma dros pas 'di skad ces smra so// de 'di ma yin 'di bdud sdig can 'grog tse 'dod pa'i dbang phyug rdul 'phral can// khyed la snying brtse ba yis
312a4(mdo sde): du dang skye nges yongs sgor 'dir gnas pa yin// 'di na gang zhig la la 'dod khams sdug bsngal bkres shing skom pa'i nad kyi 'jigs// sems can de yang rab tu thar byed khyed
312a5(mdo sde): cag myur du sdug bsngal rnams las thar par byed/ sa'i dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces smra so// de lta ma yin 'di rgyal lha dbang 'bral dga' ldan 'phrul ba gzhan
