365b5(mdo sde): bya ba'i dngos po yang byed par 'gyur te/ rgyu des ni mang 'di ni yul la phan 'dogs pabyed pa yin// mad 'di ni phan yon gzhan yang mang du yod/ yun drung
365b6(mdo sde): ri brjed par mi nuso// de'i phyir mdo 'di khyed rnams la yo ngasu gtang // de nas de'i tshe rnam thos kyi bu la sogs pa lha rnams dang / klu yi rgyal po dang / lha me de dag 'khor
365b7(mdo sde): bcas te langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyar sngar/ pus mo'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rna
365b8(mdo sde): kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' spyi 'os len par 'tshalo// yang gsol pa/ ston pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad bka' stsal pa bzhin du mchod rten go ma sa la b.rang
366a1(mdo sde): ri blang ru yul dang bcas pa thams cad/ yongasu bsrung bar 'tshal/ bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa dang / chos dang 'thun pa'i rgyal po dang / rab tu 'byung ba
366a2(mdo sde): ngang chos dang 'thun par yul 'dzir nga dang / chos dang 'thun pa'i spyir bdag dang / gang zhig bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dgyed par 'gyur ba dag thams cad kyang yongs
366a3(mdo sde): bsrung bar ni 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das ji srid yul 'dir dkon mchog gsum mchod gnas 'gying pa dang / yul 'dzin pas kyang chos dang 'thun par yul skyong zhing / ches dang
366a4(mdo sde): mi 'thun pa'i sems cad rnams kyi mgon mi bgyid pa de srid// bdag cag gis yongasu bsrung bar rngo thog ste/ mdo 'di yang li yul ring du gnas par dgyi ba'i sladu la
366a5(mdo sde): yul ras nyi 'og tu gyur pa'i rgyal po dang / blon po rnams la mdo 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis li yu la gyi tshe du/ ri glang ru las bshad yin zhes rnar brags pa
366a6(mdo sde): dbyi/ sug par thob par bgyi// sems bsgyur bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das nam yul 'dir dkon mchog gsum mchod gan su mi bgyid cing // chos dang mi 'thun pa rnams
366a7(mdo sde): kyi mgon lhag par bgyid pa de'i tshe/ sems bsgyur bdag cag rnams kyi gzi brjid dang / mthu stobs nyams par 'gyur bas yul 'di'i ched dang bsrung bar ni rngo ma tho'o// 
366a8(mdo sde): spang zhe na/ bdag cag rnams kyi mthu stongs dang / gzi brjid ni bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa dang / chos dang mthun par yul chos bzhin du skyong ba dang / bsod nangs bya
366b1(mdo sde): ba'i dngos po dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthus 'phel bar 'gyur ba lagaso// de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gdan las bzhengs nas/ ri blang ru'i steng gi 'gram nas mchod
366b2(mdo sde): rten go ma sa la gnad gang na ba de log su gzigs nas/ yang nas yang du de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul mchod rten go ma sa la gnad dang / ri glang ru dang / yul dang bcas pa la/ 
366b3(mdo sde): gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du byin gyis brlabs nas/ li yul thams cad dang / 'tsho'i nang na gnas pa'i sems can grangs med pa rnams la 'od gzer dang / thugs rje chen po
366b4(mdo sde): byang bar mjed/ 'od gzar de dang / thugs rje chen po des chun gnas pa'i sems can de dag thams cad sdug bsngal ni zhi bar gyur/ khro ba dang khon du 'dzin pa dang ni bra
366b5(mdo sde): byams pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur cing / lha'i bde ba dang ldan nas skad cig de nyid la/ sems can de dag las grangs med pa zhig tshe 'phos nas/ lha dang mi
366b6(mdo sde): rnams kyi nang du skyes te/ sangs rgyas nyi du' gyur pa'i sa don rnyed cing / byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams lal/ 
366b7(mdo sde): gsum gyi bar du nges nas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyed kyis dam bcotsos pa rnams ni brtson 'grus med par mi 'bru'o// rigs kyi bu ngas bskal pa grang
366b8(mdo sde): med pa gsum gyi bar du dka' ba spyad pa'i bstan pa 'di dang / mchod rten go ma sa la gan da yul dang bcas pa khyed rnams la yongasu gtad kyis yongasu srung shig/ khyed
367a1(mdo sde): rnams las gang zhig gis brjesu drar zhing gzungs yod pa dang / bstar pa bsrung ba des ni bstan pa 'di la rang tu drung ba rnams yongasu bsrung bar gyis shig
367a2(mdo sde): de cir spang de ra/ ri khyim pa la la zhig lo ngargya'i bar du nyid re zhing dge ba'i rtsa bang song nams chen po byed la/ 'ga' zhig nyid cig rab tu drung nas bstan pa la gnas na
367a3(mdo sde): snga ma bas phyi ma'i bsod rams kyi brgya'i char yang mi cha'o// de ci'i slad zhe na/ sangs rgyas pad+ma'i kla gi bye ma snyed thams cad kyang sngar khyim gyi gnas spangs te rang
367a4(mdo sde): tu drung ras/ spyod lam de nyid kyis byang chung chen po brnye so// nga yang pha rol tu phyin pa drub yongasu rdzogs ste/ sa pa sung rnyes nas srid pa tha ma'i tshe/ nam byed ras rgyal po'i khang nas
367a5(mdo sde): drung ste/ rabs tshal du gshegasaso// rabs cha la nas gzhon nga rgyal po yad kyi theg tu sgri nas/ rang gi sgra ral bris bregs te/ nga'i bos gya rom nga rin thang med pa/ 
367a6(mdo sde): rngon dade dag las chos gos ngur smrig du rjes// ngas chos gos de gyon nas dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal skyangasu song nas/ rab tu drung nga'i spyod lam
367a7(mdo sde): bzung ba dang / lnga thams cad nga la phyag 'tshal/ skyabasu song nas phyi bzhin du 'dra'o// nga yang spyod lam de nyid kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas brnyes// de'i phyir bde bar
367a8(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i bstar ba ni dam pa yin par shes par bya'o// rab tu drung ba ni bsod nams dang ldan par shes par bya'o// 'jig rten na rab tu byung ngas thob pa ma gtogs par
367b1(mdo sde): khyim pa'i cha lugs kyis dgra bcam pa 'am/ Sha sangs rgyas sam// tham med pa'i byang chub 'thob pa ni lus kyang mthas ma mthong // rab tu byung ba'i spyad las 'di ni 'jigs
367b2(mdo sde): na lnga la sogs pa thams cad kyi mchod gnas yi no// de nas de'i tshe lnga dang lha mo de dag thams cad stan las langs te/ dbyangs gcig tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la 'di
367b3(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar bka' stsal pa bzhin 'tshal zhing / bsam bzhin du bka' las 'gal bar
367b4(mdo sde): mi 'tshalo// yul 'dir sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul mchod rten dang bcas pa yang kun tu bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang rje su bzang ba
367b5(mdo sde): 'tshal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang / bdag cag rnams la mthu ljang du gsol// de ci'i sladu zhe na/ ma 'ongs pa'i rtsod pa'i dus ra byin gyis brlangs pa'i yul 'di
367b6(mdo sde): dab mang po dang / ma dad pa dang / phyir rgol ba bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa la/ dang pa'i khyad par mi rnyed cing / bstan pa gzhig pa'i slad brtson pa dag 'thung ba'i slad du'o// 
367b7(mdo sde): de nas de re tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lha de dag legaso zhes bya ba gnang ste/ skyes du dam pa rnams leg so// leg so// ngas kyang yul 'di byin gyis brlangs zir to// byin gyis
367b8(mdo sde): rlangs pa de nyid kyis mtshams bcad pa yang yino// ma 'ongs pa brtsod pa'i dus na/ yul 'di gzhom pa'i phyir/ sum pa'i dpag phal po che dang / drug gu rus sna tshogs dang / 
368a1(mdo sde): / sor dang / gzhan yang dad pa med pa dag 'ong bar 'gyur te/ de'i tshe yul gzhan dang gzhan dag nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan byis gyis darlang
368a2(mdo sde): bdag yul 'dir gshegs nas/ yul gyi sa mtshams bsrung bar mdzad/ bsod nams kyi stobs des na yul 'di gtan brlag par mi 'gyuraro// gzugs brnyar de dag
368a3(mdo sde): gi phyi bzhin du// byang chub sems dpa' dang / lga dang / klu dang / mthu stobs dang ldan pa mang po dag 'ong zhing / yul yul du gnod pa rnams bzlog par byed/ dag rnams kyi
368a4(mdo sde): yul mi tshems par byed / dge ba can zhes bya ba'i mkhar nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba'i 'byung gnas shes bya ba'i gzugs brnyar gshegs nas/ rung phyogs mkhar
368a5(mdo sde): ku sheng du bzhugs shing / yul gyi sa mtshams bsrung bar 'bru ro// byang phyogs yul shen zha zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan shen zha zhes
368a6(mdo sde): d+ya nga sa'i 'og nas 'byung bar 'gyur zhing yul gyi sa mtshams bsrung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan ki'u yang zhes bya ba gshegs nas/ sha
368a7(mdo sde): phyogs yul phye ma zhes bya ba'i mkhar du bzhugs shing yul gyi sa mtshams bsrung bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs panan phye sa zhes bya bar gshegs nas
368a8(mdo sde): byang phyogs kyi re blang ru la 'od srung gi mchod rten drung du bzhugs shing / dge slong dgon pa pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing / de bzhin bshags pa'i bstan pa dang / 
368b1(mdo sde): yul gyis mtshams srung bar 'gyuraro// mkhar dge ba can zhes bya ba'i nang na// tshong ngus kla sta 'di re zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan/ rgyal po'i pho brang
368b2(mdo sde): banas zhes bya bar bzhugs shing / mkhang dge ba yul dang bcas pa'i sa mtshams bsrung bar 'gyuraro// sa bzhi nyo mo nya zhes bya ba gang du rgyal po la zhes bya ba mkhar 'acig
368b3(mdo sde): ba'i gros byed par 'gyur ba de / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan cu gon pa na zhes bya ba bzhugs shing / mkhar dge ba can zhes bya ba yul dang bcas pa'i sa mtshams
368b4(mdo sde): dasrung bar 'gyuraro// gtsug lag khang dir dzA zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa mar mo mdzad kyi gzugs brnyan thor kong du byas pa gshegs par 'gyur te/ gzugs
368b5(mdo sde): brnyan de ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi thor khong du byas pa/ thams cad kyi thog mar 'byung ba yino// gzugs brnyan de/ li rnams kyis mtshan 'khor ba'i mar me mdzad
368b6(mdo sde): ces bya bar 'dogs pa gyur te/ de ni li yul gyi gzugs brnyan thor kong du byed pa thams cad kyi dper 'gyur bde bar gshegs pa yul dang bcas pa yongasu srung bar
368b7(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mang gi gzugs brnyan yul 'di'i dngasu gshegs nas/ phyogs bcu'i mtshams gcod par mdzad/ ji srid du de ba
368b8(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i gzugs snyar phyogs phyogs na bzhugs pa de dag mchod gan su byed pa de srid du/ yul 'di brlag par mi 'gyuraro// yul 'di nas skyes pa'i mi 'am/ 
369a1(mdo sde): / yul bzhan ras skyes pa'i mi me snyan zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzugs brnyad de dag la snying zab pa nas dad pa dang / bus pa dang / rab tu dang bar
369a2(mdo sde): byed cing / 'di snyam du bde bar gshegs pa de gzugs brnyad 'di dag na/ yul 'di bsrung ba'i spang gshegs snyam du yang seras ra/ gzugs parnyang de dag kyang sangs rgya
369a3(mdo sde): bzhugs pa bzhin don mdzad par 'gyur// de ci'i sla ru she na/ gzugs de dgang dang 'dra bar dus gsum du thogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlangs pa
369a4(mdo sde): phyir// gzhar yang yul 'dir nga'i gzugs brnyar chen po shing rngas 'dre pa byas te/ mkhar dge bcar zhes bya ba'i rang du bzhags ras/ mchod gnas chen
369a5(mdo sde): por byed par 'gyuraro// de ras yul 'dir bya gas dang phyogs mtshams nas/ tshong dpo/ chen po rnams 'ong bar 'gyur zhing / gnod pa rnams kyang ni
369a6(mdo sde): bar 'gyuraro// gzhan yang yul 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs 'dran nyis brgya rtsa brgyad/ 'od srung gi mchod rten dang bcas par 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de
369a7(mdo sde): dag thams cad kyang cho 'phrul chen po ston cing sems can rnams kyi sdig pa chen po yongasu sbyong ba dang / bdod pa sel ba mdzad par 'gyuraro// yul 'dir gnod
369a8(mdo sde): bdang / 'jigs pa dang / skrag pa 'ga' zhig byung da/ yul 'di ched du phyogs lngar sbyar ba byas te/ rgyal po dang / rjen pa rnams yul 'dzin pa gang zhig 'jigs
369b1(mdo sde): dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir/ bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa las bsod nams skyed par 'dod na/ gtsug lag khang car ma zhes bya bar bsod nams bya'o// de ci'i phyir
369b2(mdo sde): zhe na/ yul 'di'i mi rngams kyi dad pa yang dag pa'i lta ba ni dang po gtsug lag khang de ras skye bar 'gyu ro// rapa zhig li'i rgyal po dang / blon po dang / yul 'dzin
369b3(mdo sde): brdang sa la bdod ba rnam pa sna tshogs zhig byung ra/ ri glang ru sdong yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gangar 'dubs pa re sa bzhi de bskor bar bya'o// yul
369b4(mdo sde): sems cad rnams las mi dge ba bshegs par 'dod na/ mchod rten go ma sa la gan de'i ga na du bshags par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mchod rten de ra
369b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa bzhin du gang dag gis bskor ba 'am/ me to/ ga gam bdug pa 'am/ dbyangs sam rol mo'i sgras mchod
369b6(mdo sde): pa byas ra/ mtshams med pa lnga yang nyams dmas par 'gyur na lta smos kyang ci dbros/ yul 'di rgyal po dang / blor po dang / yul 'dzin pa 'am/ gang
369b7(mdo sde): zhig brtul bzhubs chen po'i sdo ba len par 'dod pa des/ ri blang ru gang la de bzhir gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan phye so zhes bya ba dang / 'od srung gi
369b8(mdo sde): mchong rtir yod pa de'i dge 'dun la mchod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yul 'dir chos spyod pa yongasu rdzogs pa dang / tshul khrims yongasu dag pa ni/ de ras
370a1(mdo sde): 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i phyiro// yul 'di'i ri la la zhig chad pa chen po zhig la thug ra/ des ri blang ru la gnas pa'i 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la sgrubs
370a2(mdo sde): su 'gro nga byas te/ des na chad pa chen po de las thar par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe ra/ gnas de na thar pa thob pa stong phrag du ma'i mtha'i bar du gnas shing mi
370a3(mdo sde): spongs pa'i phyir te/ rgyu des na ri glang ru dang / mchod rten go ma sa la gan da yul dang bcas pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chang khyu yi ro// de ras de'i tshe byeg
370a4(mdo sde): bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag nas/ byang chub se mas dpa' nyi khri lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang ba na bde logasu thal ma sbyar ba datude/ dbyangs
370a5(mdo sde): gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan la ngas bdag cag rnams kyis kyang / thabs sde tshogs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod la ma dang / 
370a6(mdo sde): yul 'di yongasu bskyang bar bgyi/ bsrung bar bgyi zhing / ji srid du bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa dang / dkor mchog gsum gnas shing // rgyal po dang / 
370a7(mdo sde): sman po la sogs pa/ mi tshul khrims dang ldan pa dad pa can dang / yul chos dang mthun par bgyid pa de srid yongasu mi gtang zhing / yul 'dir dusu spyod lam dang
370a8(mdo sde): lugs ci dang / ji lta bus sems can mang po'i bsod nams chen po yongasu smin par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas nyid du sems bskyed par 'gyur ba dang / bsapa
370b1(mdo sde): gtan dang / ting 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas nyid las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur pa de lta bu'i skye ba blang ba'i bsla du/ kha cig gis ni
370b2(mdo sde): rgyal rigs yongasu bzung bar bgyi/ kha cig gis ni rab tu byung ba dang / khyim gzhan gyi cha lugs yangasu gzungs par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
370b3(mdo sde): pa rigs kyi bu leg so// legaso// rigs kyi bu khyed rnams kyis 'di ltar bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul dang / yul 'di gang du sems
370b4(mdo sde): can rnams/ sangs rgyas nyid las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur bar de lta bu chu gang thob shig/ yang de'i tshe rnam thos bu zhes bya ba dang / mi 'pham pa zhes bya ba la
370b5(mdo sde): sobs pa lha thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'a des la 'di skad gsol to// bcom ldan 'das da ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis yul 'ang
370b6(mdo sde): bsrung ba'i slad du mthu btangs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyis brlabs dang / mthus bdag cag rnams kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul dang / byin
370b7(mdo sde): gyis brlabs pa'i brlabs pa'i yul 'di/ kun tu bsrung zhing yal bar mi gtang ba'i sgrang/ brtson 'grus chen po'i shugs kyis 'bad par 'tshalo// gal te yul
370b8(mdo sde): 'dir gru gu la sogs pa gtung po dad pa mar chis pa rnams dang / hor dang / sum pa'i dpag dag mche bar 'gyur na/ de dag phan tshun nang 'drug 'thung ba dang / 
371a1(mdo sde): ngag gi 'khor dang mi 'thun par 'gyur ba dang / 'bum par 'gyur bar bgyi'o// yang ra de dag ci nas kyang 'dir mi mchi zhing / de bzhir ba tu
371a2(mdo sde): pa'i bstan pa 'jig mi nus par bgyi ba'i slad/ gzhan gyi dbang du 'gyur bar bgyi'o// gal te rgya'i dpag dag mchis par gyur na/ de dag gi sems dang
371a3(mdo sde): par bgyi zhing slar yul 'dil phar 'dogs pa dang / phyis yul 'dir bsod nams dgyi ba'i dngos po dge ba rgya chen po 'gying du stsal to// nam zhig yul
371a4(mdo sde): 'di'i sems cad rnams la gnod pa ra 'gyid pa de'i tsher yang phyir dad par bgyi zhing mdo 'di yang khong du chud par dgyid du stsal to// gang gi
371a5(mdo sde): tshe de dag pa 'ongs par dkon mchog ga sum gyi yo byad la dbang 'tshal zhing mdangs 'phrog pa dang / sems cad bsod nams dang ldan pa
371a6(mdo sde): rangs la 'jo ba de'i tshe ri/ bdag cag gi 'khor gnod sbyir dad pa can dang / dad pa ma mchis pa du ma zhig dngang bskur te/ bkye ras yul der ci ras kyang
371a7(mdo sde): yud ring mo zhig gi bar du rgud par dgyi zhing / yul 'di 'jig mi nus par dgyi slad du/ mu go dang / rang dang / pha rol gyi dpag mi mchi bar bgyid stsal
371a8(mdo sde): laM yul gyi nor rdzas de dag gis 'tshal ba rnams kyang dkra bi shis par dgyi zhing / gang dang gang du byin pa'i yul de thams cad du yang sngar me
371b1(mdo sde): thogs shing 'khrug par bgyi'o// de dag gi yul 'dzin pa dang dpag dpon yang rgud par dgyi'o// bod kyi dpag rnams la yang de bzhin du rig par bgyi te/ gang
371b2(mdo sde): gi tshe de dag chos dang 'thun par yul 'di 'dzin cing srung da ni/ bdag cag rnams kyis kyang de dag yongasu bskyang zhing rgyal bar 'gyur bar bgyi'o// dam zhig dang
371b3(mdo sde): dar gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'jig pa dang / yul gyi mi la gnod par dgyid pa de'i tshe na/ dpag rnams ring 'khrug 'byung ba dang / dpag gi dpor yang
371b4(mdo sde): thung nga rgud par bgyi ste/ rgyas par ni snga ma bzhi ro// ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yul 'di'i rgyal po dang / blo po sems gya gyu car/ bsod nams chung ba dang / 
371b5(mdo sde): dad pa med pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi dkor la 'jol nyag du rlom zhing / yul gyi rtsis mgo dang mgal bar bgyid pa/ nor rdzas ma brtags
371b6(mdo sde): pas go 'angang 'chol ba/ sems can ngaso de rnams dang ldan pa rnams la sun 'byin tu rgol ba/ ngo tsha med pa dang 'dus can/ 'dod pa'i yon tan gyis ngoms
371b7(mdo sde): mi myong ba/ rab tu byung ba dag gis sems skye ba la la dag 'byung bar 'gyur na/ de dag ni bdag cag gis kyang yul 'di ras dbyung zhing yul nga rang gzhan dang
371b8(mdo sde): gzhan dag tu spyugs par bgyis ste/ tshul de lta bus yul 'di yongasu bskyang ba dang / bsrung bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das slang ma chong pa'i dus na/ yul 'di
372a1(mdo sde): gzhig par 'tshor ba'i sems cad bdud kyi phyogs sdig pa dbying ba/ mthu stobs dang ldan pa/ yul dag tu sems can rnams kyi dad pa zlog par dbying pa/ 
372a2(mdo sde): sems gdug cing brlang ba/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang srin po du ma zhig 'byung bar 'gyur la/ de dag kyang bdag cag gi dbang du mi 'gyur ra/ de la bdag cag gas
372a3(mdo sde): thabs ji ltar 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyed yid skye bar mi byed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gling bzhi pa 'ang na/ byang chub sems dpa'
372a4(mdo sde): rnams dang / lha mthu stobs che ba dang / klu dang gdong sbyin sa thob pa du ma zhig gnas pa de dag la/ sems 'jam pos mchod pa chen po byas te/ mchod rter go ma sa la bar
372a5(mdo sde): da dang / gtsug lag khang cer ma la sogs pa/ yul byin gyis brlabs brlabs pa rnamasu// theg pa chen po 'i sde snod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 'dus pa
372a6(mdo sde): chen po dang / sangs rgyas ngal po che dang / dkon mchog ba rtsegs pa la sogs shin tu rgyas pa'i sde mang po lhogs shig dang / yul so so nas byang chub sems dpa'
372a7(mdo sde): sa bcu pa la sogs pa dang / mthu stobs che ba'i sems can de dag yul 'dir 'ongs nas/ chos kyi ro mnos shing / dus gsum du gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
372a8(mdo sde): kyi dam tshig las mi 'gal bar byed/ bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul dang / yul yang bsrung bar byed/ yul 'di'i mi dang bstan pa yang bsrung bar byed
372b1(mdo sde): bar 'gyur// gzhan yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ yul dge ba 'di'i rgyal po mthu chung bar 'gyur te/ mthu chung ba des na rang gi mthu stobs kyis yul mi thub pas/ rgyal po
372b2(mdo sde): dad pa can gzhan 'di lta ste/ bod kyi rgyal po dang / rgya'i rgyal po la sogs pa la skyabs brtsal nas yul bsrung bar byed// de ci'i byar zhe na/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus ra/ rgya dang
372b3(mdo sde): bod kyi yul du dkon mchog gsum gnas shing / mchod gnas chen por byed pa dang / yul de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i gnasu 'gyur zhing / sems
372b4(mdo sde): can de dag kyang byang chub chen po'i lam tshol ba'i nga tshul can/ theg pa chen po la dad pa'i ting 'dzin la ga zhol bar 'gyur te/ de dag gi mthu stobs kyis li
372b5(mdo sde): yul gyi me dang / dkon mchog gsum brlags par mi 'gyur ro// skyes bu dam pa khyed rnams kyis kyang dod dang / rgya'i rgyal po dang / blong po dag ci nas mchod rten pa
372b6(mdo sde): mas la gnang dang / yul dge ba 'di la ri mi byed par 'gyur ba dang // yul 'di song nams bya ba'i dngos po dpe nga rgya chen po byed par 'gyur ba dang / yul 'di'i pi nyi
372b7(mdo sde): dad pa med pa'i yul gzhan du 'khyams pa rnams kyang / sdug bsngal dang bral zhing bde bar rang gi yul du bskyal nas/ phyir yang dag pa'i lta ba can dang / bsed rabs la dag
372b8(mdo sde): ngar 'gyur bar sems sgrar cig dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i stongs kyis/ skyes bu dam pa khyed rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / mang sa dang gzi brjid dang / 'khor 'phel bar 'gyur 'a
373a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas nyi yang nye bar 'gyur gyis/ dus gsum du btogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bdapas ngag la byas pa gzo bar gyis sheg/ 'di ltar 'di'i
373a2(mdo sde): sems cad rngams ni phyir mi ldog pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i las dang ldan pa/ snying rje dang ldan pa/ 'de rang dang lda nga / gtong phod pa/ phrag dog dang / khon du 'dzin pa rnam par
373a3(mdo sde): spangs la/ dras pa gza 'tshas la dpa' ba/ yang dag pa'i lta bcan/ log pa'i ltab thams cad rnam par sbas pa/ sems 'jam par 'gyur te/ rgyu des rang gi ban
373a4(mdo sde): shes bya'o// yul 'di mkhar yang mi byams pa dang / 'jam pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / mchod rten dang / gtsug lab khang du sems brgyad par 'gyur te/ 
373a5(mdo sde): de'i phyir mkhar dge ba can zhes bya'o// gzhan yang yul bzhan dag nas/ sems can dad pa med pa// snga ma khor du 'dzin pa dag yul 'dir 'ongs pa kun/ 
373a6(mdo sde): yul 'di'i rdul gyis rig cing / yul 'di ras 'khrungs pa 'tsho ba la longs spyod na/ de dag thams cad kyi sems bsgyur ras/ sems 'jam pa dang / byams pa'i bsam pa da
373a7(mdo sde): dri dang / khon du 'dzin pa spangs pa dang / dang pa dang / yang yul 'dir sdog pa mi byed par 'gyur te/ yul 'di ni yon tan 'di dag dang ldan pa yin// de ras de'i tshe
373a8(mdo sde): sngar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis lan gsum gyi bar du byir gyis brlangs nas/ 'od gzer thugs rje chen po dang bcas te dkyeng des/ chur gnas pa'i sems
373b1(mdo sde): can rnams kyi sems yongs su dag pa dang / bde ba dang ldan par byas nas chu'i nang nas slar te/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du khyab par gyur to// yang
373b2(mdo sde): 'od gzer de dag log nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis yul byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nyan thos cher po rnams kyis yul byin gyis brlangs pa dang
373b3(mdo sde): mtsho'i rang ras byung ba'i pad+mo'i steng na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan bzhugs pa de dang de dag gi 'ong bzer de dang 'dres ras ra mkha' las 'phags te/ steng gi
373b4(mdo sde): mamakha' khengs par gyur cing / li yul thams cad du lha'i me tog gi char phab bo// lha'i me tog de dang / phan tshur du reg pa las chos kyi sgo mo 'di lta ste/ sangs
373b5(mdo sde): rgyas dang / chos dang dge 'dun gyi mtshan dang / ya bdag pa'i lta ba dang / shes rab dang / tshul khrim sa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
373b6(mdo sde): rnams kyi dka' ba spyad pa dang / smon lapa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / sems can yongs su smid par byed pa dang / dge sbyong gi 'bras bu ba'i
373b7(mdo sde): be rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / khams gsum gyi srid pa las nges par 'byor pa dang / rnar par thar
373b8(mdo sde): pa'i sgo gsum dang / 'du byed 'jig pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / ngasam gtan dang / sdu ba'i
374a1(mdo sde): dngos po dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / gzugs med pa'i stongs par 'jug pa bzhi dang / dbang po yongasu dag pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs dang
374a2(mdo sde): mthud pa'i chos mtha' dag gi sgra 'byin par 'gyuraro// gzhan sems yongasu dag pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lab dang / 'phags pa'i lam dang / sengs par 'jug pad
374a3(mdo sde): sa dang stobs dang / thugs rje dang / byams pa cher po dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / the tsom sel ba dang / sangs rgyas nyid las mi ldog pa dang / ting 'dzer
374a4(mdo sde): dang mngon par rtogs pa dang / mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa dang / nga 'dres pa dang / sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur/ ba dang / mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang
374a5(mdo sde): bdag med pa dang / stong pa dang / ma byas pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / phyin ci ma log pa dang / yang dag par mtha' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po
374a6(mdo sde): khong su rtogs par rnam par mi rdog pa'i ye shes rtogs pa dang / rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis so so rang gis rig pa'i spyod yul dang / skye ba sdug bsngal ba dang / rga ba dang / 
374a7(mdo sde): sdug pa dang dral ba dang / mi sdug pa dang phrad ba dang / 'dod pa btsal te marnyed pa'i sdug bsngal gyi sgra yang drung bar gyur to// gzhan yang phung po lnga dag las sems can med pa
374a8(mdo sde): dang / gsod dang / gang zag dang / srog med pa dang / chos bden pa skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa/ rtag pa med pa/ chad pa med pa/ 'ongs pa med pa/ 'gro ba med po// 
374b1(mdo sde): dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung dang / byin gyis brlabs dang / 'gro ba lnga po dag gi 'phrul pa/ rmi lam lta bu dang / 'khor ba'i 'du byed rtson ra lta bu dang / sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang
374b2(mdo sde): chu zla ba dang / brag cha lta bu zhes bya ba'i sgra byung bar gyur to// gzhan yang dad pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang / 'khor
374b3(mdo sde): bas skyo bar gyur pa dang / de lta bu las sogs pa sgra brgya stong du ma byung bar gyur to// 'khor 'dus pa mang po de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' phyogs phyogs nas lhags
374b4(mdo sde): pa de dag thams cad sa la gnas pa'i lha dang / klu dang / nam mkha' la gnas pa'i lha dang / gnod sbyin thams cad sems ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ rangs pa skyes te/ chos kyi
374b5(mdo sde): sgo mo'i sgra de dag la yid mi byed par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe 'kho ra de dag gis khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ bya nga chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal
374b6(mdo sde): gzhor nur gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gso la to// bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du chu 'phrul chen po 'di lta bu bstan pa lags/ bco
374b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal chos kyi sgo mo 'di dag ni/ yul dge ba nas skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi ched dang / 'khor
374b8(mdo sde): bzhi po rnams kyi che du yang lhag par byin gyis brlabs nas bstan pa yin te/ chos kyi sgo mo 'dis ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams tshogs chung ngu dang / 'ad pa chung
375a1(mdo sde): dus dbang po dang / shes pa yongs su dag par 'gyur zhing chos kyi sgo me de dang de dag kyang mngon par rtogs par 'gyur// ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo de
375a2(mdo sde): de byis pa chung ngu yan chad chos mngon par rtogs par dga' zhing / rtsed mor yang chos kyi sgo mo 'di dag smra bar 'gyu ro// sems can de dag dbang po yongasu rtags nas
375a3(mdo sde): chos kyi rig rnam par dag pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang mthong bar 'gyur/ chos kyi rna ba rnam par dag pas/ chos yang dag pa ma nor ba yang thos
375a4(mdo sde): par 'gyur/ de dag 'khor ba nas 'du byed dang / chos thams cad las kyang sems rnam par grol bar 'gyur te/ sems de lta bu des na/ yul dgon
375a5(mdo sde): pa byir byas brlabs pa 'dir/ dge ba'i phyag sa la brtson pa 'am/ yang ri glang ru la de dag thams cad dngos grub thob par gyur te/ bdud sdig car
375a6(mdo sde): gyis kyang blags mi rnyed na/ gzhan dag gis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 'di lta ste/ lha rnams kyis 'khor gdod sbyin 'am/ dri za'am/ mi 'am ci chad
375a7(mdo sde): pas gcad par gyur na yang / mchod rten goms la gar dang / ri glang rul 'bras na/ de dag gis mi mthong bar 'gyur ro// ngargyal mthong na yang sem
375a8(mdo sde): zhi bar 'gyur te/ rgyu des na ri glang ru dang mchod rten go ma sa la gan da ni/ mtshabs gcad pa dang / gtsang byed dang skyabs dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
375b1(mdo sde): gzhan dag na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyis kyang phyag bya bar 'os pa yin// mchod rten go ma sa la gan da dang / re blang ru dang / yul dge ba dang / 
375b2(mdo sde): mkhar dge ba can dang / dgon pa byin gyis brlabs pa'i ming thos nas/ dad pa skyes pa tsam gyis kyang sdig pa chen po 'byang bar 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe bco
375b3(mdo sde): ldaran 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / rnam thos kyi bu la bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu khyed gnyis song la/ mtsho chen po 'dir sha'i ri drol te/ 
375b4(mdo sde): byang phyogs logs su gyi sho tsang po'i nang du pho la/ chu la gnas pa'i sems can rnams la mi gnod par srung ba dang / yul 'di mtshams mngon
375b5(mdo sde): par gyis shing // de nas nyan thos chen po shA ri'i bu dang / rnam thos kyi bus de bzhi na 'tshal lo zhes gsol nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyis na mkha' las
375b6(mdo sde): shA'i ri gang na ba de logs su chas te/ shA ri'i bus naM lag na mkhang sil thogs/ rnam thos kyi bus ni lag nang du thogs ste/ sha raM byed skam
375b7(mdo sde): blangs te/ nub phyogs su bzhag nas/ chu srol chen po gtong ngo // mtsho srog chags dang chas kyi sho rtsang po'i rang du po ste/ tshul de lta dus mchod
375b8(mdo sde): rten 'goms la gar da dang / ri glang ru dang yi yul de mngon par byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa spyad ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
